You can now reduce complexity by removing the Feed entirely from the mobile app interface. Previously, the Feed tab on the mobile app was visible by default and you couldn’t hide it.

notes.feature_name: Field Service Mobile App Support on Android 11 Is Deprecated
notes.description: As of this release, support for the mobile app on Android 11 and earlier devices is deprecated. The Winter ’26 and later versions of the Field Service mobile app require Android 12 or later. The Summer ’25 and earlier versions of the Field Service mobile app still work on Android 11 devices. To maintain access to critical security updates, bug fixes, and new features, update your mobile devices to the latest version of Android and the Field Service mobile app. Important: The Field Service mobile app must be no more than two major releases behind the Salesforce platform for the app to continue to work with Lightning web components. The Summer ’25 version stops being compatible when the Summer ’26 version is released.

notes.feature_name: Control Bulk Status Change Icon Visibility for Bundled Service Appointments
notes.description: Avoid mishaps by disabling the Bulk Status Change Icon for Bundled Service Appointments in the Field Service mobile app. Previously, the icon was visible by default. Mobile workers could easily change the status of all bundled appointments with a single tap, potentially causing issues for customers with specific validation rules.

notes.feature_name: Revamped Work Order Overview Page
notes.description: Enhance performance with the fast-loading work order overview screen. Each tab and card on the overview page now loads independently, so you can access critical information faster. The modernized user interface has a sleeker look and feel and optimized screen space, so you now see more content at a glance. Previously, you had to wait for all the tabs to load before seeing the entire user interface.

notes.feature_name: Loading Stages During App Startup
notes.description: Keep mobile workers informed with real-time progress updates on the app's loading status, eliminating uncertainty during app startup.

notes.feature_name: Loading Progress Indicator
notes.description: The home screen of the Field Service mobile app now displays a loading progress indicator instead of a static Field Service logo, providing better visibility into background processes.

notes.feature_name: Updated Technical Guidance for Mobile App Performance
notes.description: Updated technical requirements for the Field Service mobile app are provided to optimize mobile app performance, ensuring more reliable, long-term performance and lower total cost of ownership.

notes.feature_name: Hyperforce Expansion
notes.description: Products and features from Data 360, Marketing Cloud, Platform, MuleSoft, and Tableau Cloud are now available in more Hyperforce regions. Additionally, the Hyperforce Assistant has introduced a new way to find hard-coded references, and the Hyperforce public IP ranges now include addresses for inbound connections.

notes.feature_name: Access Salesforce in More Regions with Hyperforce
notes.description: Hyperforce is available in 17 countries, giving you more choice and control over data residency. Delivery of the Salesforce Customer 360 application suite via Hyperforce, including Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, B2B Commerce, Platform, and Industries clouds, is available in Australia, Brazil, Canada, France, Germany, India, Indonesia, Israel, Italy, Japan, Singapore, South Korea, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Arab Emirates, the United Kingdom, and the United States.

notes.feature_name: Find Hard-Coded References Using the Updated Hyperforce Assistant Process
notes.description: The automated check previously available in step one of Hyperforce Assistant has been replaced due to updates in underlying tools. The remaining Hyperforce Assistant features remain unchanged. Hyperforce Assistant helps customers prepare their org for migration. Because your org’s instance changes during migration, hard-coded references cause functionality failures post-migration. Finding and resolving hard-coded references during the preparation phase enables applications to maintain correct functionality after the upgrade to Hyperforce.

notes.feature_name: Hyperforce Public IP Ranges Now Include Inbound Addresses
notes.description: The Hyperforce public IP address ranges have been expanded to include inbound addresses for traffic to your Salesforce org. Previously, these ranges contained IP addresses only for connections from Salesforce to the customer network. Now, these ranges also contain IP addresses for inbound connections to your Salesforce org. Salesforce recommends adopting modern security practices, such as mTLS, instead of allowlisting on Hyperforce. But for customers with an insurmountable business or compliance requirement to use allowlists, Salesforce provides Hyperforce public IP ranges in JSON format.

notes.feature_name: Prepare for IPv6 in Hyperforce Public IPs
notes.description: If you use an IP allowlist to restrict network traffic or you restrict access to Salesforce via IP address, prepare to update your allowlists to include IPv6 addresses.

notes.feature_name: Marketing Cloud Growth
notes.description: Marketing Cloud products help build customer relationships efficiently with personalized marketing messages and automated journeys.
notes.availability: Now available in Italy and Sweden.

notes.feature_name: Salesforce Advanced Cross-Region Continuity
notes.description: Salesforce Advanced Cross-Region Continuity is a premium product that provides an enhanced level of continuity to commercial Hyperforce customers during an extraordinary regional disaster.
notes.availability: Now available for Hyperforce commercial customers in Japan and the United States.

notes.feature_name: Shield Platform Encryption
notes.description: Salesforce Shield helps you build extra levels of trust, compliance, and governance right into your applications.
notes.availability: Now available in all commercial Hyperforce regions.

notes.feature_name: Salesforce Shield Database Encryption
notes.description: Encrypt entire orgs on Hyperforce with Salesforce Shield Database Encryption.

notes.feature_name: Tableau Cloud
notes.description: Tableau Cloud is a fully hosted, cloud-based, enterprise-grade analytics solution designed to empower organizations with intelligent tools and insights.
notes.timeline: Also available in Australia, Canada, Germany, India, Indonesia, Japan, Singapore, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, and the United States.

notes.feature_name: Updated Hyperforce Assistant Process
notes.description: The automated check previously available in step one of Hyperforce Assistant has been replaced due to updates in underlying tools. The remaining Hyperforce Assistant features remain unchanged. Hyperforce Assistant helps customers prepare their org for migration. Finding and resolving hard-coded references during the preparation phase enables applications to maintain correct functionality after the upgrade to Hyperforce.
notes.activation_required: To check for hard-coded references and prepare your org for Hyperforce migration, install and run the Salesforce Labs Org Check package.

notes.feature_name: Hyperforce Public IP Ranges Update
notes.description: The Hyperforce public IP address ranges have been expanded to include inbound addresses for traffic to your Salesforce org. Previously, these ranges contained IP addresses only for connections from Salesforce to the customer network.
notes.security_notes: Salesforce recommends adopting modern security practices, such as mTLS, instead of allowlisting on Hyperforce.

notes.feature_name: Hyperforce Public IP Ranges
notes.description: Salesforce provides Hyperforce public IP ranges in JSON format. This change applies to all Salesforce orgs that manage connectivity using IP allowlists, including those on Hyperforce and on first-party infrastructure. These ranges support products built on the Salesforce platform, including Sales, Service, and Industries clouds, as well as Tableau and the MuleSoft Anypoint Platform. These addresses are not for email, and not for Marketing Cloud, Commerce Cloud, or Slack.

notes.feature_name: Prepare for IPv6 in Hyperforce Public IPs
notes.description: If you use an IP allowlist to restrict network traffic or you restrict access to Salesforce via IP address, prepare to update your allowlists to include IPv6 addresses. This change applies to Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in all editions.

notes.feature_name: Stock Rotation Incentives
notes.description: Improve partner collaboration with Stock Rotation Incentives by managing returns or scrapping unsold stock for incentives. Manage incentive spending by defining, allocating, and tracking budgets across stock rotation, standard rebates, ship and debit, and price protection programs. Enhance financial reporting with subledger integration by recording rebate claims and payouts in your Accounting Subledger.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Communications Enhancements
notes.description: Learn more about the latest features from Agentforce Communications, formerly Communications Cloud, that enhances your experience with access to new Industries common components. Manage larger orders and link cloned quotes to opportunities in Enterprise Sales Management. Discover, set up, and track usage of Revenue Cloud for Communications features with Salesforce Go. Boost revenue by applying promotions directly to a quote or an order.

notes.feature_name: Retail Execution Visit Assistant
notes.description: Optimize retail execution with AI-driven insights in Consumer Goods Cloud with Retail Execution Visit Assistant. Streamline field operations for users with visit, order, and document cancellation. Prevent duplication of listing classification records with enhanced checks, and improve tour management with new and updated data objects. Diagnose and optimize sync performance using Named Query Analyzer. Generate professional documents with improved PDF previews, custom dimensions, and global date formats. Capture inventory actuals and streamline synchronization with the automatically installed TPM Data Connector. Set up certain Consumer Goods features from a single location through Salesforce Go.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Energy & Utilities Bulk Upload
notes.description: Upload customer site data in bulk and automate group creation to generate complex quotes quickly. Discover and configure Agentforce Energy & Utilities features by using Salesforce Go.

notes.feature_name: Financial Services Cloud AI Enhancements
notes.description: Discover the power of Financial Services Cloud, which uses AI to unify customer data from banking, wealth, and insurance platforms. Financial Services Cloud enables personalized engagement, faster onboarding, and improved customer loyalty with industry-specific automation and AI-powered services. With trusted AI, the platform delivers intelligent insights for financial planning, helping customers achieve financial success.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Health Enhancements
notes.description: Discover, set up, and track usage of Agentforce Health, formerly Health Cloud, with Salesforce Go. Summarize claim and member coverage details by using Agentforce for Payer Contact Center. Improve data extraction accuracy by using custom extraction templates. Secure data continuity through offline assessments by using Home Health. Leverage Integrated Care Management to support suggested responses and autosave for all assessments. Resolve duplicate prior authorization request cases by using Utilization Management.

notes.feature_name: Digital Insurance Capabilities
notes.description: Use Digital Insurance capabilities in your existing org along with the Insurance managed package or Insurance CRM. Optimize policy issuance, renewals, endorsements, and cancellations with complete versioning. Manage the end-to-end agency billing workflow with greater accuracy, automation, and financial control. Boost sales efficiency with unified multi-root quoting. Help users compare insurance products side by side and select an optimal plan. Apply policy limits over more flexible durations, automatically cap payments at the lowest remaining limit, and authorize and track ex-gratia payments.

notes.feature_name: Data 360
notes.description: Streamline your Account Management data with Data 360. Focus on the right accounts with the enhanced Next Best Customer component. Make quick, ad hoc adjustments to Activity Plans. Use the enhanced Activity Measure workflow to track a wider range of activities. Boost engagement efficiency with new remote visit capabilities, AI-based and voice-based data capture, and a centralized Visit Management experience in the Service Console.

notes.feature_name: Collaborative Medical Insights
notes.description: Drive informed execution and mitigate risks effectively with Collaborative Medical Insights. Use Smart Content Search to improve your search results and find relevant material.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Media Features
notes.description: Streamline the setup process for Agentforce Media features such as Advertising Inventory Management and media plans through Salesforce Go's centralized dashboard. Streamline workflows by processing line items individually and refreshing media grids instantly. Manage audio and video ad spots precisely with dedicated maximum ad runtimes and skippable options. Maximize campaign precision with advanced inclusion rules, granular postal code options, and MuleSoft Direct enhancements for Google Ad Manager.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Net Zero
notes.description: Scale your Agentforce Net Zero data management by using the ESG Data Collection Agent, powered by generative AI. Centralize environmental, social, and governance (ESG) data from multiple Salesforce orgs into a single source of truth in Data 360. Streamline the process of tracking and reporting Fuel and Energy-Related Activities (FERA) emissions and Transmission and Distribution (T&D) losses under Scope 3 Category 3.

notes.feature_name: Agent-First IT Support
notes.description: Transform IT service delivery with Agent-First IT Support for Public Services. Accelerate hiring and simplify license discovery with Agentforce. Streamline investigative case management setup by using Salesforce Go, collect fees directly on your portal with Inbound Payments, and support complex reporting needs by generating larger documents.

notes.feature_name: Align Accounting Subledger with Your Institution’s Data Strategy
notes.description: Adopt Data 360 to align financial data processing with your broader data architecture. Switch between Data 360 and CRM Analytics as the runtime for the Accounting Subledger Data Processing Engine without the need to reconfigure entire job definitions. Use either platform to manage accounting operations based on performance, scale, and licensing, and as needs evolve.

notes.feature_name: Enhance Proactive Customer Service with Agentforce
notes.description: Improve proactive customer service by using the enhanced features of the Asset Service Estimation agent topics as part of the Asset Service Management agent. Efficiently select price books for a chosen service work type, the relevant products and their quantities. Choose to specify a different coverage for each product and simplify the process of incorporating asset warranties, entitlements, or service contracts. Create a more enriched quote with the specific discount details for each selected product. Create work orders with an asset’s account ID and with the asset name and work type name.

notes.feature_name: Manage Asset Recall Inquiries Using Prebuilt Service Templates
notes.description: Use prebuilt service process templates to handle asset-related recall inquiries, such as eligibility questions or dealer appointment details. These templates help Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) accelerate implementations, enabling faster deployments and improving operational efficiency. Easily view the list of assets for the selected customer account, check whether a specific asset is part of an active recall, and share details of the relevant authorized service partners. A case is created and automatically closed post fulfillment of the service process request and an email is sent to the customer with the relevant recall inquiry details.

notes.feature_name: Access Claims from Product Service Campaign Items
notes.description: View claims on a product service campaign item record. Assign a related list and access the claims associated with a particular product service campaign item.

notes.feature_name: Timesheet and Labor Cost Optimization Enhancements
notes.description: Enable field technicians to associate assets with timesheets and capture detailed information by using configurable forms. Technicians can update verified timesheets to maintain accuracy, while supervisors and admins control the visibility of entry fields to match operational needs. Service resources can use Agentforce to handle time-tracking tasks like creating and verifying timesheets.

notes.feature_name: Upsell and Cross-Sell Products for Service with Agentforce
notes.description: Use Agentforce to empower every technician and service rep, regardless of their expertise, to identify and propose upgrades or add-ons for specific assets or recommend new products during customer interactions. The agent navigates users through product discovery, clarifies user intent for accuracy, and identifies the most relevant product options based on customer needs. It then helps generate quotes for selected products and capture quote approval.

notes.feature_name: Enhance Proactive Customer Service with Agentforce
notes.description: Improve proactive customer service by using the enhanced features of the Asset Service Estimation agent topics as part of the Asset Service Management agent. Efficiently select price books for a chosen service work type, the relevant products and their quantities. Choose to specify a different coverage for each product and simplify the process of incorporating asset warranties, entitlements, or service contracts. Create a more enriched quote with the specific discount details for each selected product.
notes.edition: Lightning Experience for Automotive, Communications, Energy and Utilities, Manufacturing, and Media

notes.feature_name: Asset Service Management Agent
notes.description: Give users the ability to manage asset services for customers by using an AI agent. In Setup, on the Agentforce Agents page, click New Agent. Then, select the Asset Service Management agent in Agent Builder. To use the Asset Service Estimation topic, launch the Agentforce panel, and specify an utterance, such as 'Give me repair estimates for this Asset.'

notes.feature_name: Improve Order Fulfillment Accuracy with Inventory Allocation
notes.description: Manage inventory allocation for sales orders and work orders across multiple locations with accurate, real-time visibility. View stock statuses, such as on-hand, allocated, and available, and soft-reserve inventory for specific orders. Assign inventory to orders to prevent overcommitment and maintain accurate inventory visibility, even during high-volume, concurrent transactions. This helps prevent stock conflicts, improves tracking accuracy, and supports smarter, more efficient fulfillment decisions.
notes.edition: Available in Lightning Experience for Automotive, Communications, Energy and Utilities, Manufacturing, and Media

notes.feature_name: Streamline Inventory Counting Across Locations
notes.description: Easily manage inventory counts across hierarchical structures, such as warehouses or service fleets, without creating separate plans for each room, aisle, or field service vehicle. Using the Location Hierarchy, you can easily define parent and child locations, so selecting a parent location in a plan automatically displays all its associated child locations. Inventory managers can then select child locations and bulk add or choose product items to create a single, comprehensive inventory count plan.

notes.feature_name: Inventory Allocation Component
notes.description: Add the Inventory Allocation component to the Order and Work Order pages to view and create allocations for products available as line items.

notes.feature_name: Streamline Inventory Counting Across Locations
notes.description: Easily manage inventory counts across hierarchical structures, such as warehouses or service fleets, without creating separate plans for each room, aisle, or field service vehicle. Using the Location Hierarchy, you can easily define parent and child locations, so selecting a parent location in a plan automatically displays all its associated child locations. Inventory managers can then select child locations and bulk add or choose product items to create a single, comprehensive inventory count plan.
notes.edition: Available in Lightning Experience for Automotive, Communications, Energy and Utilities, Manufacturing, and Media, where Asset Service Lifecycle Management is enabled.

notes.feature_name: New and Changed Objects for Inventory Management
notes.description: Do more with the new and updated objects for Inventory Management. Changed Objects include: Store the quantity of product items that are allocated but not yet shipped using the new field Quantity Allocated on Product Item; Store the quantity of product items that are currently available in inventory using the new field Quantity Available on Product Item; Store the date and time when the quantity status of the product item was last updated using the new field Quantity State Refresh Date on Product Item. New Objects include: Represent the production batch details for a product campaign definition item using the new Inventory Reservation object; Represent inventory item reservation information for a specific product and location using the new Inventory Item Reservation object.

notes.feature_name: Manage Asset Recall Inquiries Using Prebuilt Service Templates
notes.product_area: Automotive Cloud, Partner Community, Communications Cloud, Energy and Utilities Cloud, Manufacturing Cloud, Media Cloud
notes.description: Use prebuilt service process templates to handle asset-related recall inquiries, such as eligibility questions or dealer appointment details. These templates help Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) accelerate implementations, enabling faster deployments and improving operational efficiency. Easily view the list of assets for the selected customer account, check whether a specific asset is part of an active recall, and share details of the relevant authorized service partners. A case is created and automatically closed post fulfillment of the service process request and an email is sent to the customer with the relevant recall inquiry details.
notes.edition: Lightning Experience in Automotive Cloud, Partner Community for Experience cloud sites, Communications Cloud, Energy and Utilities Cloud, Manufacturing Cloud, Media Cloud

notes.feature_name: Access Claims from Product Service Campaign Items
notes.product_area: Automotive Cloud, Communications Cloud, Energy and Utilities Cloud, Manufacturing Cloud, Media Cloud
notes.description: View claims on a product service campaign item record. Assign a related list and access the claims associated with a particular product service campaign item.
notes.edition: Lightning Experience in Automotive Cloud, Communications Cloud, Energy and Utilities Cloud, Manufacturing Cloud, Media Cloud

notes.feature_name: Timesheet and Labor Cost Optimization Enhancements
notes.description: Enable field technicians to associate assets with timesheets and capture detailed information by using configurable forms. Technicians can update verified timesheets to maintain accuracy, while supervisors and admins control the visibility of entry fields to match operational needs. Service resources can use Agentforce to handle time-tracking tasks like creating and verifying timesheets.

notes.feature_name: Associate Assets and Equipment with Timesheets
notes.description: Track the usage of heavy equipment and other assets by associating them directly with timesheets and individual timesheet entries. Field technicians can now input asset details when creating or updating their timesheets.

notes.feature_name: Capture Details with Configurable Forms
notes.description: Enhance data collection in the field by configuring data capture forms on the Field Service mobile app. By using Flows and Lightning Web Component cards, you can create custom forms for technicians to capture specific details on the home page and the Timesheets page.

notes.feature_name: Control Timesheet Entry Field Visibility
notes.description: Align the Timesheets app with your operational needs by controlling the available fields for technicians. You can now configure specific fields, such as a custom picklist for delay reasons, to appear when a technician creates or edits a timesheet entry.

notes.feature_name: Update Verified Timesheets
notes.description: Keep timesheets accurate without waiting for supervisor approval to reopen them. Field technicians can now add, update, or delete timesheet entries even after a timesheet is in the verified state. When you add a new entry to a verified timesheet, the system updates the start and end times of the parent timesheet entry.

notes.feature_name: Manage Timesheets and Timesheet Entries with Agentforce
notes.description: Service resources can now record their activities, such as work, drive, and break times. They can also access a comprehensive view of timesheet data, including status and validation errors, to resolve issues. Furthermore, they can seamlessly initiate the verification or submission process for their timesheets.

notes.feature_name: New Invocable Actions in Timesheets and Labor Cost Optimization
notes.description: Do more with the new invocable actions in Energy and Utilities Cloud.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce for Timesheets
notes.description: Agentforce for Timesheets allows users to manage timesheets within Agentforce. Users can create timesheets and entries, verify or submit timesheets, and get timesheet details. Categories for entries can be resolved to values such as WorkTime, DriveTime, BreakTime, and MealTime.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Energy & Utilities
notes.security_notes: This feature uses Einstein Generative AI and may consume Einstein Requests or Flex Credits or Data Cloud Requests. Einstein Generative AI Features and Data Cloud are provided on a separate infrastructure with different security protections and physical hosting locations than the Services.

notes.feature_name: New Invocable Actions in Timesheets and Labor Cost Optimization
notes.description: New invocable actions have been introduced to enhance functionality in Energy and Utilities Cloud. These include createTimesheetsAndTimesheetEntries, verifyOrSubmitTimesheet, and getTimesheetDetails actions.

notes.feature_name: Associate Assets and Equipment with Timesheets
notes.description: Field technicians can now track the usage of heavy equipment and other assets by associating them directly with timesheets and individual timesheet entries. They can input asset details when creating or updating their timesheets.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Energy & Utilities

notes.feature_name: Capture Details with Configurable Forms
notes.description: Enhance data collection in the field by configuring data capture forms on the Field Service mobile app. By using Flows and Lightning Web Component cards, you can create custom forms for technicians to capture specific details on the home page and the Timesheets page.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Energy & Utilities

notes.feature_name: Control Timesheet Entry Field Visibility
notes.description: Align the Timesheets app with your operational needs by controlling the available fields for technicians. You can now configure specific fields, such as a custom picklist for delay reasons, to appear when a technician creates or edits a timesheet entry.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Energy & Utilities

notes.feature_name: Update Verified Timesheets
notes.description: Keep timesheets accurate without waiting for supervisor approval to reopen them. Field technicians can now add, update, or delete timesheet entries even after a timesheet is in the verified state. When you add a new entry to a verified timesheet, the system updates the start and end times of the parent timesheet entry.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Energy & Utilities

notes.feature_name: Upsell and Cross-Sell Products for Service with Agentforce
notes.description: Use Agentforce to empower every technician and service rep, regardless of their expertise, to identify and propose upgrades or add-ons for specific assets or recommend new products during customer interactions. The agent navigates users through product discovery, clarifies user intent for accuracy, and identifies the most relevant product options based on customer needs. It then helps generate quotes for selected products and capture quote approval.
notes.activation_required: In Setup, turn on Asset Service Lifecycle Management. Then, assign the Agentforce permission set to your users and configure the Upsell and Cross-sell agent topic.
notes.edition: Available in Lightning Experience for Automotive, Communications, Energy and Utilities, and Manufacturing

notes.feature_name: Industries Sales Assistance and Asset Service Management agents
notes.description: Enhance sales productivity and proactive customer service by using the Industries Sales Assistance and Asset Service Management agents. Sales reps can automate tasks like searching for products, accessories, and parts, creating opportunities with dealer mapping, and generating quick quotes with manual discounts. Service reps can efficiently manage service estimations, incorporating price books, product coverage, and warranties to produce enriched, detailed customer quotes.

notes.feature_name: Payment Deferral service process
notes.description: Enable efficient Payment Deferral service process request intake through guided Omniscript forms for customers and service reps. Enhance lending processes with the Funding Workbench app for post-contract document review. Improve the dealer experience by simplifying document upload, task management, and communication for loan contract finalization.

notes.feature_name: Recall Inquiry Service Process
notes.description: Simplify the intake and fulfillment of recall inquiry service process requests by using a prebuilt screen flow. Customer support reps can efficiently verify an asset's recall status and assist customers in locating authorized dealers for booking appointments. Easily view the list of assets with an open recall for a customer account, and check its relevant details such as the associated product service campaign and the preferred partner. A case is created and automatically closed post fulfillment of the service process request and an email is sent to the customer with the relevant recall inquiry details.

notes.feature_name: Automotive Claims Access
notes.description: View Automotive claims on a product service campaign item record. Assign a related list and access the claims associated with a particular product service campaign item.

notes.feature_name: Automotive Feature Discovery and Setup
notes.description: Discover, set up, and configure Automotive Agentforce agents such as Asset Finance Management, Industries Customer Engagement, and Industries Sales Assistance with more efficiency by using Salesforce GO. Manage Automotive finance processes by setting up Vehicle and Asset Lending and other related features from a single location. Discover common components such as Record Alerts, Events and Milestones, Discovery Framework, and Complaint Data Sharing to streamline Automotive business operations. Enable cross-cloud features such as Inventory Count, Actionable Event Orchestration, and Inventory Search and Transfer to deliver better service.

notes.feature_name: Fleet Management Enhancements
notes.description: Easily associate vehicles or assets to a new fleet or an existing fleet, from a fleet record page, or an asset or vehicle list view. Search for vehicles using Criteria-Based Search and Filter and assign them immediately to an existing fleet based on the search result. Ensure efficient fleet management, optimizing workflows for fleet managers and inventory specialists.

notes.feature_name: Stage Management for Key Automotive Objects
notes.description: Implement stage management across critical Automotive objects such as Appraisal, Fleet, Vehicle, and Product Service Campaign Group Definition. Provide a structured, traceable, and controlled process for managing the life-cycle of Automotive business operations through defined stages. Maximize service efficiency, reduce turnaround time, and enhance customer lifetime value.

notes.feature_name: Automotive Data Access and Mapping
notes.description: Utilize file-based data kits to access data streams, data model objects (DMOs), and mappings for Automotive business use cases. Use four new DMOs, Inventory Serialized Product, Lead Line Item, Business Profile, and Account Location to support newer analytics by using Tableau Unified Analytics and other relevant use cases in data cloud.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Automotive Enhancements
notes.description: Do more with the new and changed Agentforce Automotive, formerly Automotive Cloud, objects.

notes.feature_name: Industries Sales Assistance
notes.description: Enhance sales productivity and proactive customer service by using the Industries Sales Assistance and Asset Service Management agents. Sales reps can automate tasks like searching for products, accessories, and parts, creating opportunities with dealer mapping, and generating quick quotes with manual discounts. Service reps can efficiently manage service estimations, incorporating price books, product coverage, and warranties to produce enriched, detailed customer quotes.

notes.feature_name: Boost Sales Productivity with Industries Sales Assistance
notes.description: Search for products and relevant accessories, find relevant dealers that sell them, create a single opportunity for multiple selected products, and manage trade-in requests for assets with the Industries Sales Concierge agent topic. Use the enhanced features of the Automotive Sales Concierge agent topic, now a part of the new Industries Sales Assistance agent template, to support more AI-assisted task automation and increase productivity of sales reps. Search for and select relevant accessories for a vehicle. Search for dealers that sell a particular vehicle and choose to capture the details as opportunity preferred seller records. Create a quote and add manual discounts as required.

notes.feature_name: Efficiently Manage Coverages for Proactive Customer Service
notes.description: Improve proactive customer service by using the enhanced features of the Asset Service Estimation and Vehicle Service Estimation agent topics as part of the Asset Service Management agent. Efficiently select price books for a chosen service work type, the relevant products and their quantities. Choose to specify a different coverage for each product and simplify the process of incorporating asset warranties, entitlements, or service contracts. Create a more enriched quote with the specific discount details for each selected product. Create work orders with an asset’s account ID and with the asset name and work type name in the subject.

notes.feature_name: Industries Sales Assistance
notes.description: Boost Sales Productivity with Industries Sales Assistance. Search for products and relevant accessories, find relevant dealers that sell them, create a single opportunity for multiple selected products, and manage trade-in requests for assets with the Industries Sales Concierge agent topic. Use the enhanced features of the Automotive Sales Concierge agent topic, now a part of the new Industries Sales Assistance agent template, to support more AI-assisted task automation and increase productivity of sales reps. Search for and select relevant accessories for a vehicle. Search for dealers that sell a particular vehicle and choose to capture the details as opportunity preferred seller records. Create a quote and add manual discounts as required.

notes.feature_name: Asset Service Estimation and Vehicle Service Estimation
notes.description: Improve proactive customer service by using the enhanced features of the Asset Service Estimation and Vehicle Service Estimation agent topics as part of the Asset Service Management agent. Efficiently select price books for a chosen service work type, the relevant products and their quantities. Choose to specify a different coverage for each product and simplify the process of incorporating asset warranties, entitlements, or service contracts. Create a more enriched quote with the specific discount details for each selected product. Create work orders with an asset’s account ID and with the asset name and work type name in the subject.

notes.feature_name: Asset Service Management Agent
notes.description: To give users the ability to manage vehicle and asset services for customers by using an AI agent, in Setup, on the Agentforce Agents page, click New Agent. Then, select the Asset Service Management agent in Agent Builder. To use the Asset Service Estimation or Vehicle Service Estimation topics, launch Agentforce from a vehicle or an asset record page, and specify an utterance, such as Summarize the vehicle record and estimate the vehicle service.

notes.feature_name: Payment Deferral Service Process
notes.description: Streamline the intake and fulfillment of payment deferral requests for automotive loans or leases by using a prebuilt service process. Use the sample APIs to perform a customer’s eligibility check and enroll them into the deferral program. Service reps can quickly initiate a service process request on behalf of customers by using the Payment Deferral template from Unified Catalog, improving customer service quality and reducing turnaround time. They can also initiate a request through the Asset Finance Management agent. Furthermore, customers can access the Omniscript-based form on the Experience Cloud site and log a request to defer payments due to unforeseen circumstances.

notes.feature_name: Funding Workbench Console
notes.description: Enhance your Automotive lending process with the Funding Workbench console by managing post-contract document reviews. The Funding Workbench console provides a single location for funding analysts to view all the required documents uploaded by dealers, execute and assign related tasks to finalize the funding for a customer’s loan or lease. They can also upload and associate relevant documents with action items for dealers to work on missing requirements. Optimize task and workflow management system while fostering seamless collaboration between stakeholders.

notes.feature_name: Post-Contract Review Tasks from Dealer Portals
notes.description: Increase efficiency of automotive loan contracting processes and improve partner experience. Dealers can easily upload documents required for loan or lease contracts by using the Funding Workbench console on an Experience Cloud site. Post review of the contract terms from a funding analyst, dealers can view the tasks or sub-tasks assigned to them with simplicity and fulfill the missing requirements and help finalize the funding for a customer’s loan or lease.

notes.feature_name: Defer a Customer's Payments in a Single Flow
notes.description: Streamline the intake and fulfillment of payment deferral requests for automotive loans or leases by using a prebuilt service process. Use the sample APIs to perform a customer’s eligibility check and enroll them into the deferral program. Service reps can quickly initiate a service process request on behalf of customers by using the Payment Deferral template from Unified Catalog, improving customer service quality and reducing turnaround time. They can also initiate a request through the Asset Finance Management agent. Furthermore, customers can access the Omniscript-based form on the Experience Cloud site and log a request to defer payments due to unforeseen circumstances.

notes.feature_name: Optimizing Automotive Loan Funding with Funding Workbench
notes.description: Enhance your Automotive lending process with the Funding Workbench console by managing post-contract document reviews. The Funding Workbench console provides a single location for funding analysts to view all the required documents uploaded by dealers, execute and assign related tasks to finalize the funding for a customer’s loan or lease. They can also upload and associate relevant documents with action items for dealers to work on missing requirements. Optimize task and work-flow management system while fostering seamless collaboration between stakeholders.

Post review of the contract terms from a funding analyst, dealers can view the tasks or sub-tasks assigned to them with simplicity and fulfill the missing requirements and help finalize the funding for a customer’s loan or lease.

Use four new DMOs, Inventory Serialized Product, Lead Line Item, Business Profile, and Account Location to support newer analytics by using Tableau Unified Analytics and other relevant use cases in data cloud.

notes.feature_name: New and Changed Objects for Agentforce Automotive
notes.description: Do more with the new and changed Agentforce Automotive, formerly Automotive Cloud, objects. Store the associated product service campaign definition partner inventory. Use the new field Product Service Campaign Definition Partner Inventory on Return Order.

notes.feature_name: Product Service Campaign Definition Production Batch
notes.description: Represent the production batch details for a product campaign definition item. Use the new Product Service Campaign Definition Production Batch object.
affected_components: Product Service Campaign Definition Production Batch

notes.feature_name: Dealer Product Searchable Field
notes.description: Represent information about dealerships selling and, or, servicing products for location-based searches. Helps customers find nearby dealer locations for purchasing products and product-related services. Use the new Dealer Product Searchable Field object.

notes.feature_name: Application Action Item Document Checklist Item
notes.description: Represent the association of document checklist items for an application action item and is used to track the status of document checklist items with respect to an application action item. Use the new Application Action Item Document Checklist Item object.
affected_components: Application Action Item Document Checklist Item

notes.feature_name: Stock Rotation Incentives
notes.description: Improve partner collaboration with Stock Rotation Incentives by managing returns or scrapping unsold stock for incentives. Manage incentive spending by defining, allocating, and tracking budgets across stock rotation, standard rebates, ship and debit, and price protection programs. Enhance financial reporting with subledger integration by recording rebate claims and payouts in your Accounting Subledger.

notes.feature_name: Incentive Budgets Management
notes.description: Gain visibility into incentive spending by defining, allocating, and tracking budgets across stock rotation, standard rebates, ship and debit, and price protection programs. Ensure budget availability for payouts, prevent overspending, and align financial commitments with program rules. Set total budget amounts manually and allocate budgets across partners or member types. Track budget consumption to manage program spend and maintain visibility into financial liabilities.

notes.feature_name: Subledger Integration for Financial Reporting
notes.description: Improve financial reporting by integrating rebate claims and rebate member payouts with your accounting subledger. This integration ensures accurate recording and accounting-ready formatting of financial transactions for rebate programs.

notes.feature_name: Salesforce Go Feature Discovery and Setup
notes.description: Salesforce Go now supports a broader range of partner engagement features that you can configure and manage from a single location in Setup. Implement features faster, reduce context switching, and simplify setup across your org.

notes.feature_name: New Connect REST APIs in Channel Revenue Management
notes.description: Learn more about the new connect API resources available in Channel Revenue Management.

notes.feature_name: Strengthen Partner Collaboration with Stock Rotation Incentives
notes.description: Facilitate manufacturer–partner collaboration by enabling structured product returns or scrap of unsold stock in exchange for incentives. Promote timely replacement of aging inventory by defining programs with allocated partner budgets. Streamline operations by integrating partner submission, eligibility validation, claim creation, and budget tracking into a single incentives framework.
notes.edition: Lightning Experience in Sales Cloud or Industries Cloud with the Channel Revenue Management add-on

notes.feature_name: Manage Incentive Budgets to Drive Financial Accountability
notes.description: Gain visibility into incentive spending by defining, allocating, and tracking budgets across stock rotation, standard rebates, ship and debit, and price protection programs. Ensure budget availability for payouts, prevent overspending, and align financial commitments with program rules. Set total budget amounts manually and allocate budgets across partners or member types. Track budget consumption to manage program spend and maintain visibility into financial liabilities.

notes.feature_name: Simplify Feature Discovery and Setup
notes.description: Salesforce Go now supports a broader range of partner engagement features that you can configure and manage from a single location in Setup. Implement features faster, reduce context switching, and simplify setup across your org.

notes.feature_name: Salesforce Go
notes.description: With Salesforce Go, you can discover, set up, and configure key features such as Agentforce for Channel Revenue Management, Channel Partner Inventory, Design Registration Price Protection, Rebate Management, Ship and Debit Claim Processing, and Stock Rotation from one place with guided support. Easily access help content and setup resources to learn about features and complete configuration seamlessly.

notes.feature_name: StockRotationExecution
notes.description: Specify the stock rotation activity defined by the business, including the affected inventory items and partner information for each member in the Stock Rotation Program.

notes.feature_name: StockRotationExecutionItem
notes.description: Specify the affected partner inventory associated with a stock rotation rebate execution defined by the business.

notes.feature_name: StockRotProgramRebateType field
notes.description: Get the stock rotation program rebate type used to determine the start and end dates of the stock rotation program associated with the partner’s unsold inventory using the new StockRotProgramRebateType field on the existing PartnerUnsoldInventory object.

notes.feature_name: StockRotationStartDate field
notes.description: Get the start date of the next eligible stock rotation program using the new StockRotationStartDate field on the existing PartnerUnsoldInventory objects.

notes.feature_name: StockRotationEndDate field
notes.description: Get the end date of the next eligible stock rotation program using the new StockRotationEndDate field on the existing PartnerUnsoldInventory objects.

notes.feature_name: New Connect REST APIs
notes.description: Learn more about the new connect API resources available in Channel Revenue Management.

notes.feature_name: Rebate Management
notes.description: Validate the setup, configuration, and applicable rules of a specific program rebate type. Make a POST request to the /connect/rebates/rebate-configuration-check resource. New request body: Program Rebate Type Validation Input. New response body: Program Rebate Type Validation Response.

notes.feature_name: Stock Rotation
notes.description: Automate stock rotation and inventory replacement. Make a POST request to the /connect/stock-rotation-execution resource. New request body: Stock Rotation Execution Input. New response body: Stock Rotation Execution.

notes.feature_name: Industries Configure, Price, Quote (CPQ)
notes.description: Improve support efficiency and deployment with the key enhancements to Industries CPQ.

notes.feature_name: Standardize processes and streamline workflows
notes.description: A new suite of common components in Agentforce Communications, formerly Communications Cloud, helps standardize processes and streamline workflows. These modular tools integrate into your architecture, helping you expand across verticals without requiring add-ons.

notes.feature_name: Enterprise Sales Management
notes.description: Improve quote clarity and workflow efficiency with new controls. Manage larger orders and link cloned quotes directly to opportunities. Protect your data by retaining original pricing and confirming line item deletions.

notes.feature_name: Associate Cloned Quotes with New or Existing Opportunities
notes.description: Associate a cloned quote with a different existing opportunity or a newly created one directly within the cloning workflow and eliminate manual re-association steps for your sales team. Previously, sales reps had to clone a quote and then manually re-associate it with the correct opportunity in a separate step. Consolidating these actions streamlines the sales process and reduces data entry errors.

notes.feature_name: Retain Original Asset Pricing During Modifications
notes.description: Preserve original asset prices during Move, Add, Change, Delete (MACD) operations in Enterprise Sales Management by defining attributes in Industries CPQ. Now, pricing calculations run only when you modify a price-impacting attribute, such as a manual override, applied discount, or quantity change. Updates to non-price attributes no longer trigger automatic repricing. Industries CPQ identifies these attributes via attribute-based pricing. This feature requires Standard Cart APIs to be enabled.

notes.feature_name: Prevent Unnecessary Action Status Updates During MACD Operations
notes.description: Preserve the Existing status on asset line items when Move, Add, Change, Delete (MACD) rules update attribute properties without altering the actual values. Industries CPQ compares the original and current values so that only actual data modifications trigger a Change status. Previously, both value modifications and metadata changes triggered a status update to Change. This feature requires Standard Cart APIs to be enabled.

notes.feature_name: Accelerate Sub-Order Creation with Scaled Batch Sizes
notes.description: Streamline your quote-to-order process by using scaled batch sizes to generate sub-orders faster within Enterprise Sales Management. Enable your sales reps to convert high-volume quotes efficiently while maintaining system stability and staying within query limits.

notes.feature_name: Confirm Deletion of Quote Line Items in the Summary Tab
notes.description: The Summary tab prompts for confirmation when you delete a Quote Line Item in an Enterprise Sales quote. This step prevents accidental removal and confirms that the deletion is intentional.

notes.feature_name: View Placeholders for Hidden Attributes in Enterprise Sales Quotes
notes.description: Get immediate context regarding attribute visibility in the Enterprise Sales Quote interface. When catalog configuration rules hide attributes, a placeholder UI label now appears rather than the fields disappearing. This UI label helps sales reps focus on customer-relevant data during the quoting process.

notes.feature_name: Process Large Enterprise Quotes with Enhanced Stability
notes.description: Manage your large enterprise deals with a robust, optimized processing engine. Your sales reps can execute bulk Move, Add, Change, Delete (MACD) operations without timeouts or system instability. High-volume datasets previously caused transaction failures and governor limit errors, leading to breakdowns in the quoting workflow.

notes.feature_name: Retain Original Asset Pricing During Modifications
notes.description: Preserve original asset prices during Move, Add, Change, Delete (MACD) operations in Enterprise Sales Management by defining attributes in Industries CPQ. Now, pricing calculations run only when you modify a price-impacting attribute, such as a manual override, applied discount, or quantity change. Updates to non-price attributes no longer trigger automatic repricing. Industries CPQ identifies these attributes via attribute-based pricing. This feature requires Standard Cart APIs to be enabled.

notes.feature_name: Prevent Unnecessary Action Status Updates During MACD Operations
notes.description: Preserve the Existing status on asset line items when Move, Add, Change, Delete (MACD) rules update attribute properties without altering the actual values. Industries CPQ compares the original and current values so that only actual data modifications trigger a Change status. Previously, both value modifications and metadata changes triggered a status update to Change. This feature requires Standard Cart APIs to be enabled.
notes.activation_required: Configure the MACDLineItemActionStatus setting in CPQ Configuration Setup.

notes.feature_name: Accelerate Sub-Order Creation with Scaled Batch Sizes
notes.description: Streamline your quote-to-order process by using scaled batch sizes to generate sub-orders faster within Enterprise Sales Management. Enable your sales reps to convert high-volume quotes efficiently while maintaining system stability and staying within query limits.

notes.feature_name: Confirm Deletion of Quote Line Items in the Summary Tab
notes.description: The Summary tab prompts for confirmation when you delete a Quote Line Item in an Enterprise Sales quote. This step prevents accidental removal and confirms that the deletion is intentional.

notes.feature_name: View Placeholders for Hidden Attributes in Enterprise Sales Quotes
notes.description: Get immediate context regarding attribute visibility in the Enterprise Sales Quote interface. When catalog configuration rules hide attributes, a placeholder UI label now appears rather than the fields.

notes.feature_name: Process Large Enterprise Quotes with Enhanced Stability
notes.description: Manage your large enterprise deals with a robust, optimized processing engine. Your sales reps can execute bulk Move, Add, Change, Delete (MACD) operations without timeouts or system instability. High-volume datasets previously caused transaction failures and governor limit errors, leading to breakdowns in the quoting workflow.

notes.feature_name: Revenue Cloud for Communications on Salesforce Platform
notes.description: Discover, set up, and configure Revenue Cloud for Communications features with Salesforce Go. Boost your customer acquisition and revenue by applying customizable promotions to quotes and orders during configuration.

notes.feature_name: Communications Cloud Sales Is Now Revenue Cloud for Communications
notes.description: We have updated product documentation and in-app wording to reflect the renaming of Communications Cloud Sales to Revenue Cloud for Communications. This name change doesn’t affect the functionality of Revenue Cloud for Communications. During the naming transition, the old name might still appear in some Salesforce resources.

notes.feature_name: Simplify Revenue Cloud for Communications Feature Configuration and Setup
notes.description: With Salesforce Go, you can discover, set up, configure Revenue Cloud for Communications features, and track feature usage, all from a single location in Setup. Learn more about features and get help with configuration by accessing content resources and links.

notes.feature_name: Refine User Access with a New Permission Set
notes.description: Simplify permission management by granting precise access to Revenue Cloud for Communications features. The Comms Sales Features permission set is renamed to Revenue Cloud for Communications Features. To maintain access to the necessary flow, connect APIs, and multisite features, use the Revenue Cloud for Communications Features and CME Sales Features permission sets.

notes.feature_name: Transform Product Discovery with New Flow and Context Definitions
notes.description: Enhance product discovery by transitioning users to use the Multi-Recipient: Discover Products flow and MultiRecipientProductDiscovery context definitions for browsing the products from the Browse Catalog page. If you've implemented the configuration for the Browse Catalog page before Spring ‘26, we recommend that use the new product discovery flow and context definitions.

notes.feature_name: Promotions in Revenue Cloud for Communications
notes.description: Use promotions to help businesses influence buying decisions and accelerate growth. Sales reps can view and apply promotions to quote and order during configuration in the Transaction Line Editor, and see real-time price adjustments reflecting discounts in the price waterfall. Sales reps can view applied promotions on assets, and amend, renew, and cancel products that have promotions. These capabilities offer greater control and efficiency in managing sales and revenue strategies.

notes.description: Use promotions to help businesses influence buying decisions and accelerate growth. Sales reps can view and apply promotions to quote and order during configuration in the Transaction Line Editor, and see real-time price adjustments reflecting discounts in the price waterfall. Sales reps can view applied promotions on assets, and amend, renew, and cancel products that have promotions. These capabilities offer greater control and efficiency in managing sales and revenue strategies.

notes.feature_name: Apply Promotions to a Quote and an Order to Boost Sales
notes.description: Enhance your sales strategy with configurable promotions. Easily configure promotion details, including type, duration, and eligibility, and add coupons for manual promotions. View and apply tailored promotions to a quote and an order directly from the configurator or the Transaction Line Editor to acquire new customers or deepen relationships with existing ones. Your sales team has the flexibility to close every deal with the best offer. You can also apply manual promotions on the quote and order record page.

notes.feature_name: Quickly Create Orders from a Quote with Promotions
notes.description: Enhance the efficiency of sales reps by automating the creation of orders from a quote with promotions based on different criteria, such as recipients, fields, or groups.

notes.feature_name: Simplify Subscription Changes for Products with Promotions
notes.description: Help your sales reps support existing customers by making it easy to update products with active promotions when a customer wants to make changes. Sales reps can handle products efficiently.

notes.feature_name: Apply Promotions to a Quote and an Order to Boost Sales
notes.description: Enhance your sales strategy with configurable promotions. Easily configure promotion details, including type, duration, and eligibility, and add coupons for manual promotions. View and apply tailored promotions to a quote and an order directly from the configurator or the Transaction Line Editor to acquire new customers or deepen relationships with existing ones. Your sales team has the flexibility to close every deal with the best offer. You can also apply manual promotions on the quote and order record page.
notes.security_notes: To see and apply promotions, users must have the Apply Promotions on Sales Transactions permission set.

notes.feature_name: Quickly Create Orders from a Quote with Promotions
notes.description: Enhance the efficiency of sales reps by automating the creation of orders from a quote with promotions based on different criteria, such as recipients, fields, or groups.
notes.security_notes: To create orders from a quote, you need the Revenue Cloud for Communications Features permission set.

notes.feature_name: Simplify Subscription Changes for Products with Promotions
notes.description: Help your sales reps support existing customers by making it easy to update products with active promotions when a customer wants to make changes. Sales reps can handle products efficiently and accurately during amendment, renewal, and cancellation of products that have active promotions. This capability ensures that customers can amend, renew, or cancel products that have promotions, providing a frictionless experience for sales reps.

notes.feature_name: New and Changed Objects for Promotions
notes.description: Do more with the new and updated Promotions objects. Stores the relationship between the asset action source and the price adjustment. Use the new AssetActionSrcPriceAdjustment object.

notes.feature_name: Retail Execution Visit Assistant
notes.description: Optimize retail execution with AI-driven insights in Consumer Goods Cloud with Retail Execution Visit Assistant. Streamline field operations for users with visit, order, and document cancellation. Prevent duplication of listing classification records with enhanced checks, and improve tour management with new and updated data objects. Diagnose and optimize sync performance using Named Query Analyzer. Generate professional documents with improved PDF previews, custom dimensions, and global date formats. Capture inventory actuals and streamline synchronization with the automatically installed TPM Data Connector. Set up certain Consumer Goods features from a single location through Salesforce Go.

notes.feature_name: Sync Management
notes.description: Sync performance evaluation is simplified with the new Named Query Analyzer tool. Sales reps can now manage Case and Order objects directly in the Consumer Goods Cloud mobile app in online and offline modes.

notes.feature_name: Improved PDF Previews and Printed Documents
notes.description: Create detailed, well-formatted documents with improved readability and flexibility of PDF previews and printed documents for your users. Define custom page dimensions and configure correct date formats to ensure that documents are tailored to specific business needs and global audiences.

notes.feature_name: Trade Promotion Management Enhancements
notes.description: Get better visibility of financial metrics throughout promotion planning and execution phases by writing back accrual amounts into tactic funds. Enhance engine capabilities by supporting accrual calculations for tiered tactics and growth programs. Help centralize data for advanced sales and promotion analysis by integrating Trade Promotion Management data with Data 360.

notes.feature_name: Manage Consumer Goods Cloud Features in One Place
notes.description: With Salesforce Go, discover, set up, configure, and track a selection of Consumer Goods Cloud features. Access content resources and links for more information and configuration help, all from one location in Setup.

notes.feature_name: Retail Execution Visit Assistant
notes.description: Retail Execution Visit Assistant now offers data-driven insights on account performance and product upsell opportunities to boost sales and efficiency. Sales reps can get immediate, AI-powered assistance directly within their mobile app, providing quick access to account summaries or product details.

notes.feature_name: AI-Driven Retail Execution Insights
notes.description: Gain comprehensive account insights and identify product upsell opportunities with Retail Execution Visit Assistant. Set up the agent using the preconfigured template with four specialized topics to retrieve and summarize retail execution data from orders, visits, audits, and customer tasks. Your users can quickly access summaries of account performance, account compliance, last visit details, and product upsell suggestions.

notes.feature_name: In-App Agent Assistance with Agentforce
notes.description: Your sales reps can now get help from agents directly in their Consumer Goods Cloud mobile app. They can chat with agents to get account summaries, product recommendations, or promotion details.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Unlimited, Einstein 1, and Agentforce 1 editions with Consumer Goods Cloud Retail Execution and Agentforce for Consumer Goods Cloud add-on licenses.
notes.timeline: Retail Execution Visit Assistant is available starting the week of February 23, 2026.

notes.feature_name: Get In-App Agent Assistance with Agentforce
notes.description: Your sales reps can now get help from agents directly in their Consumer Goods Cloud mobile app. They can chat with agents to get account summaries, product recommendations, or promotion details. This integration gives sales reps direct access to agentic capabilities, enhancing their productivity and helping with decision-making.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Unlimited, Einstein 1, and Agentforce 1 editions with Consumer Goods Cloud Retail Execution

notes.feature_name: Cancel Visits, Documents, and Orders on the Mobile App
notes.description: Give hybrid users and drivers the ability to cancel visits, orders, and delivery documents from their mobile device. Reduce manual communication when external factors, such as traffic, payment issues, or inventory problems, prevent the completion of a visit or order. Configure cancellation reason and geolocation tracking requirements to maintain audit trails for field operations.

notes.feature_name: Voice-Activated Notes
notes.description: Give your sales reps a hands-free experience with voice-activated notes, powered by speech-to-text integration, even when they’re offline. Additionally, they can use their voice to capture survey data or update orders in the app using speech-to-text and prompt template APIs when they’re online.

notes.feature_name: Maintain Listing Classification Data Integrity
notes.description: The Listing Module on the New Listing Classification page is now a picklist that matches the entries on the Edit page. When your users create or update listing classifications the user experience is consistent. To prevent duplicate records, the application also checks for unique combinations of Product Category and Listing Module for an account.

notes.feature_name: Cancel Visits, Documents, and Orders on the Mobile App
notes.description: Give hybrid users and drivers the ability to cancel visits, orders, and delivery documents from their mobile device. Reduce manual communication when external factors, such as traffic, payment issues, or inventory problems, prevent the completion of a visit or order. Configure cancellation reason and geolocation tracking requirements to maintain audit trails for field operations.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Unlimited, Einstein 1, and Agentforce 1 editions with Consumer Goods Cloud Retail Execution
notes.security_notes: To set up cancellation reasons and geolocation tracking through the Consumer Goods Cloud desktop app, you need the Direct Store Delivery for Consumer Goods Cloud Offline Mobile App permission set. To cancel visits, orders, and documents on the Consumer Goods Cloud mobile app, drivers need the CGCloud Tour Driver permission set, OR the (CGCloud Retail Tour Driver AND CGCloud Retail User) permission sets. Hybrid users need all the permission sets required for the hybrid user persona.

notes.edition: Enterprise, Unlimited, Einstein 1, and Agentforce 1 editions

notes.description: Calls the prompt template service to generate prompt text.

notes.description: Specifies the types of visits to retrieve from the Get Retail Execution Visits By Account Agentforce action.

notes.feature_name: Named Query Analyzer Tool
notes.description: Get a clear view of the execution of complex named queries and the handling of large data volumes in the Named Query Analyzer tool. Admins can use this tool to spot sync configuration issues and take steps to resolve them.

notes.feature_name: Manage Orders and Cases Offline in Consumer Goods Cloud Mobile App
notes.description: Customizers can build offline scenarios using objects with names as reserved keywords such as Case. Sales reps can add and edit Case and Order objects directly in the Consumer Goods Cloud mobile app, even in offline mode. Sales reps can also address customer issues and process orders during store visits.

notes.feature_name: Offline Management for Orders and Cases

Sales reps can also address customer issues and process orders during store visits.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Unlimited, Einstein 1, and Agentforce 1 editions with Consumer Goods Cloud

notes.feature_name: Visual Studio Code Based Modeler
notes.description: Create detailed, well-formatted documents with improved readability and flexibility of PDF previews and printed documents for your users. Define custom page dimensions and configure correct date formats to ensure that documents are tailored to specific business needs and global audiences.

notes.feature_name: Customize Page Dimensions and Styles in Print Layout
notes.description: Design custom page dimensions and override default formatting by using the styles node. The style designed for a paragraph applies to all paragraph elements in the print layout. You can set the style name to paragraph, table, and headings. Specifying attributes such as font size, margin, bold, and italics is optional.

notes.feature_name: Other Improvements in Visual Studio Code Based Modeler
notes.description: The PDF preview now automatically splits content pages, improving readability without affecting thermal printing. Adapt page layout rules to append more columns and apply center alignment. Configure day and year values in correct formats for all supported languages.

notes.feature_name: Customize Page Dimensions and Styles in Print Layout
notes.description: Design custom page dimensions and override default formatting by using the styles node. The style designed for a paragraph applies to all paragraph elements in the print layout. You can set the style name to paragraph, table, and headings. Specifying attributes such as font size, margin, bold, and italics is optional. Adapt PrintLayout V2 contracts with page dimensions or custom sizes with these standard formats - A4 (default), A5, EXECUTIVE, FOLIO, LEGAL, LETTER, and TABLOID. You can now define pageSize with an array of width and height in points, where 1 inch = 72 points. For example, pageSize="[216, auto]". The styles node configuration isn’t supported for Bluetooth thermal printers.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Unlimited, Einstein 1, and Agentforce 1 editions with Consumer Goods Cloud

notes.feature_name: PDF Preview Improvements
notes.description: The PDF preview now automatically splits content pages, improving readability without affecting thermal printing. Adapt page layout rules to append more columns and apply center alignment. Configure day and year values in correct formats for all supported languages. Content is now automatically split into pages in the preview. Previously, all content appeared on a single page when the PDF height was set to auto for 3-inch Bluetooth thermal printers. This change makes it easier to read in the preview without affecting the actual thermal printing. You can set the minimum width requirement for <th> elements in the print layout up to 8%. You can also center align <th> elements.
notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Consumer Goods Cloud

notes.feature_name: International formatting in date selection
notes.description: Configure the PickerDaySuffix and PickerYearSuffix attributes in your locale contract to show day and year values in correct format in the date wheel for all supported languages. This allows for proper localization of date formats, catering to languages like Japanese that require '年' (Year) and '日' (Day) characters alongside numeric values.

notes.feature_name: Get Accrual Data Directly in Tactic Funds
notes.description: Configure the write-back of accrual amounts into tactic funds. The aggregated accrual output is updated in the tactic fund to inform the key account manager of what the current accrued liabilities and other financial metrics are.

notes.feature_name: Get Accurate Financials for Tier Tactics and Growth Programs
notes.description: Key account managers (KAMs) can calculate accruals for tier tactics and growth programs. Accrual calculations for tier tactics provide KAMs with an accurate picture of liabilities throughout the entire promotional lifecycle.

notes.feature_name: Integrate Trade Promotion Management Data with Data 360 for Enhanced Insights
notes.description: Enhance visibility into Trade Promotion Management (TPM) writeback KPIs in Data 360 by centralizing your data. Get a comprehensive view of product sales, promotion impact, and business trends by analyzing TPM data alongside external B2B and B2C data. Easily access and validate the writeback KPI data within Data 360.

notes.feature_name: Customize the Trade Calendar and Account Plan Views with Smart UI Enhancements
notes.description: Give your key account managers a more focused user experience by customizing the promotion phases that appear in the trade calendar and account plan views based on their sales organization. Meet specific market needs and business requirements by defining the type of product selection available for each sales organization.

notes.feature_name: Choose Which Promotion Fields to Show in a Customer Business Plan
notes.description: Show only the relevant fields on the Promotions tab to help key account managers focus on the data they need to analyze a promotion or hide the page entirely. The account manager can select a promotion link to go to the promotion’s page. Translate the field labels in any Salesforce-supported language.
