notes.feature_name: Agentforce Financial Services
notes.description: Financial Services Cloud is now Agentforce Financial Services. You may see references to Financial Services Cloud in our application and documentation.

notes.feature_name: Accelerate Setup with Salesforce Go
notes.description: Salesforce Go expands its support for Agentforce Financial Services, formerly Financial Services Cloud, introducing a single setup location for all key features. Discover Digital Lending capabilities on Salesforce Go and take advantage of expanded configurability across all Agentforce Financial Services features for a more tailored implementation experience.

notes.feature_name: Advanced Document Validation
notes.description: Improve document validation by defining specific fields for each document checklist item, reducing user friction and increasing accuracy across related records.

notes.feature_name: Flexible Hierarchies
notes.description: Create hierarchies to visualize complex business relationships with customers and partners. Use the insights to drive strategic innovations and scale operations across your business.

notes.feature_name: Complaint Management
notes.description: Accelerate complaint resolution and mitigate risk with immediate Slack and email alerts for priority cases.

notes.feature_name: Digital Lending
notes.description: Give your customers the best loan application experience and simplify compliance with the Discovery Framework. Start with prebuilt components in the Discovery Framework sample template for Digital Lending to quickly set up loan application intake. Accelerate intermediary firm registration with automated due diligence and verification workflows for digital lending. Streamline intermediary employee onboarding with automated approvals that grant compliant access and permissions instantly. Help intermediary loan originators to submit and track applications using guided tools, reducing errors and processing delays.

notes.feature_name: Enhanced Financial Services Client Portal Template
notes.description: Upgrade the service process self-service experience for customer community users with the enhanced Financial Services Client Portal template. From AI-generated knowledge summaries to context-aware quick chats and service processes catalog, deliver intelligent, connected support experiences with ease.

notes.feature_name: Transaction Dispute Management
notes.description: Capture complete details for automated clearing house (ACH) disputes with a guided questionnaire. Submit disputes for unlisted transactions, and retain your selections as you move through the intake form. Speed up the Mastercard® dispute stage setup process with a preconfigured stage definition template.

notes.feature_name: Data Cloud Integration for Financial Services Objects
notes.description: Unify client data across channels by ingesting Lead, Case, and Financial Account Transaction objects from Financial Services Cloud into Data Cloud.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Financial Services Jumpstart Bundles
notes.description: Quickly get started with Agentforce Financial Services, formerly Financial Services Cloud, by using preconfigured features and flows designed to reduce setup time and complexity.

notes.feature_name: New and Changed Agentforce Financial Services Objects
notes.description: Do more with new and updated Agentforce Financial Services, formerly Financial Services Cloud, objects.

notes.feature_name: New Connect REST API for Flexible Hierarchies
notes.description: Ensure your flexible hierarchies are in Draft status and meet data model constraints before processing.

notes.feature_name: Action Plans and Events and Milestones
notes.description: Customize the quick actions on an action plan template record page. Include document checklist items in actions plans for financial accounts. Learn about the life events in a client’s household at a glance.

notes.feature_name: Collections and Recovery
notes.description: Boost cash flow and reduce bad debt with outbound dialer campaigns.

notes.feature_name: Discovery Framework
notes.description: Streamline multilingual customer assessments by presenting forms in the user's preferred language, ensuring compliance and maintaining historical data accuracy. Map responses to specific question versions for consistency. Use natural language instructions to efficiently create and refine assessment questions with Agentforce.

notes.feature_name: Process Compliance Navigator
notes.description: Use Process Compliance Navigator to ensure your organization meets regulatory requirements, internal policies, and industry standards. Compliance governance is strengthened with new validation criteria enforcing auditable transitions for controls, regulations, and policies, ensuring consistent evidence. Efficiency is improved by using context definitions for streamlined data access in validation and Compliant Data Sharing for records.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce for Financial Services
notes.description: Scale your team by using agents for Financial Services to deliver outstanding client experiences.

notes.feature_name: Banking Service Customer Assistance
notes.description: Use the Agentforce Banking Service Customer Assistance agent template to create agents that serve your banking customers across multiple channels. Resolve inquiries faster by connecting with customers on voice, WhatsApp, and third-party websites.

notes.feature_name: Financial Advisor Assistance Agent for FSC Managed Package
notes.description: Modernize wealth advisor workflows within Financial Services Cloud Managed Package by using the FinServ Package Financial Advisor Assistance Agent, which automates routine tasks and delivers AI-driven insights from client portfolios and market trends.

notes.feature_name: Transform Digital Customer Experience with Agentforce Banking Service Customer Assistance
notes.description: Support your customers with an AI-powered self-service that autonomously creates cases for banking inquiries and helps them with their queries. The agent securely verifies customer identity to access sensitive account information. This integrated verification helps customers complete tasks without switching screens. For complex service requests, the agent conversationally escalates the interaction to live service representatives with full context.

notes.feature_name: Engage Banking Customers on WhatsApp
notes.description: Your customers can securely raise requests for banking services on WhatsApp. Route banking customer inquiries from WhatsApp to the Agentforce Banking Service Customer Assistance agent with the prebuilt Route Messaging Session to Banking Service Agent Omni-Channel flow. Offer quick resolution to reduce friction and call volume by meeting customer demands where they communicate daily.

notes.feature_name: Extend Banking Support to Third-Party Websites
notes.description: Use a prebuilt flow to route banking service inquiries from third-party websites or your bank's secure internet portal to the agent. Embed the Agentforce Banking Service Customer Assistance agent to securely manage interactions for guest users, recognize logged-in users, and initiate customer authentication on third-party websites.

notes.feature_name: Enhance Transaction Inquiries with Natural Language
notes.description: Help your users find transactions by using natural language. The updated Get Transaction agent action now uses LLMs (Large Language Models) to understand complex, multilayered requests. For example, users can ask for 'all debits over $500 from the last month'. In addition, with three new Lightning Web Components, the agent can show financial accounts, balances, and transactions more clearly in the Agentforce Banking Service Employee Assistance console and Banking Service Customer Assistance chat interface.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Banking Service Customer Assistance
notes.description: Support your customers with an AI-powered self-service that autonomously creates cases for banking inquiries and helps them with their queries. The agent securely verifies customer identity to access sensitive account information. This integrated verification helps customers complete tasks without switching screens. For complex service requests, the agent conversationally escalates the interaction to live service representatives with full context.

notes.description: Use the prebuilt agent topics included in the Banking Service Customer Assistance template.

notes.feature_name: Funds Transfer to Own Account Request
notes.description: Helps customers set up one-time or recurring fund transfers between savings and deposit accounts, including loan and credit card payments. Collects necessary payment details, and creates a case for the fund transfer.

notes.feature_name: Report Credit or Debit Card Request
notes.description: Helps customers report their credit or debit card as lost, stolen, destroyed, or captured by an ATM. Shows the necessary card details, and creates a case to block the card to prevent unauthorized use.

notes.feature_name: Fee Reversal Request (beta)
notes.description: Helps customers reverse the fees charged to their financial accounts. Assists in identifying the specific transaction to reverse by showing relevant details, and submits the reversal request for processing.

notes.feature_name: Engage Banking Customers on WhatsApp
notes.description: Your customers can securely raise requests for banking services on WhatsApp. Route banking customer inquiries from WhatsApp to the Agentforce Banking Service Customer Assistance agent with the prebuilt Route Messaging Session to Banking Service Agent Omni-Channel flow. Offer quick resolution to reduce friction and call volume by meeting customer demands where they communicate daily.

notes.feature_name: Extend Banking Support to Third-Party Websites
notes.description: Use a prebuilt flow to route banking service inquiries from third-party websites or your bank's secure internet portal to the agent. Embed the Agentforce Banking Service Customer Assistance agent to securely manage interactions for guest users, recognize logged-in users, and initiate customer authentication on third-party websites.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Financial Services
affected_components: Agentforce Banking Service Customer Assistance agent
notes.security_notes: Make sure to configure Allowed Domains (CORS and Trusted URLs) for secure connectivity and validate the integration through testing.

notes.feature_name: Enhance Transaction Inquiries with Natural Language
notes.description: Help your users find transactions by using natural language. The updated Get Transaction agent action now uses LLMs (Large Language Models) to understand complex, multilayered requests. For example, users can ask for 'all debits over $500 from the last month'. In addition, with three new Lightning Web Components, the agent can show financial accounts, balances, and transactions more clearly in the Agentforce Banking Service Employee Assistance console and Banking Service Customer Assistance chat interface.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Financial Services

notes.feature_name: Financial Advisor Assistance Agent for FSC Managed Package
notes.description: Modernize wealth advisor workflows within Financial Services Cloud Managed Package by using the FinServ Package Financial Advisor Assistance Agent, which automates routine tasks and delivers AI-driven assistance.

notes.feature_name: Financial Advisor Assistance Agent for FSC Managed Package
notes.description: Transform the wealth advisor's daily workflow within the Financial Services Cloud Managed Package by using the FinServ Package Financial Advisor Assistance Agent. The agent integrates AI-powered insights to automate routine tasks, including client data aggregation, meeting preparation, and portfolio performance summarization. It provides wealth advisors by delivering actionable, financial insights derived from client portfolios and current market trends.
affected_components: FinServ Package Financial Advisor Assistance Agent

notes.feature_name: Salesforce Go Expansion for Agentforce Financial Services
notes.description: Salesforce Go expands its support for Agentforce Financial Services, formerly Financial Services Cloud, introducing a single setup location for all key features. Discover Digital Lending capabilities on Salesforce Go and take advantage of expanded configurability across all Agentforce Financial Services features for a more tailored implementation experience.

notes.feature_name: Advanced Document Validation
notes.description: Improve document validation by defining specific fields for each document checklist item, reducing user friction and increasing accuracy across related records.
notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Financial Services

notes.feature_name: Simplify Validation for Document Checklists Items
notes.description: Define a multilevel object hierarchy and specify the exact fields against which documents need to be validated, based on the Document Checklist Item’s category and type. Reduce user friction and increase validation accuracy by helping users focus on required data points across related records. Improve efficiency by defining which fields need to be validated for a specific document checklist item.
notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Financial Services

notes.feature_name: Flexible Hierarchies
notes.description: Create hierarchies to visualize complex business relationships with customers and partners. Use the insights to drive strategic innovations and scale operations across your business.

notes.feature_name: Map Complex Business Relationships to Assist in Decision-Making
notes.description: Visualize layered hierarchical relationships between entities and individuals to gain insights into legal structures, sales networks, and credit risks. Spot expansion opportunities across your portfolio and accelerate deal cycles by identifying stakeholders who influence buying decisions. Uncover liabilities to mitigate risks and ensure compliance during loan appraisal. Track intermediary compensation and multilevel distribution, and scale operations effectively.

notes.feature_name: Speed Up Complaint Resolution
notes.description: Drive quicker response times to critical complaints with immediate alerts to assignees in Slack. Assignees without Slack access receive email notifications so they don’t miss critical complaint updates.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Financial Services

notes.feature_name: Streamline Loan Application Intake and Audit with Discovery Framework
notes.description: Use Discovery Framework to create questionnaires for customers who apply for secured or unsecured loans. Surface the questions in a guided application experience built with Omnistudio, and embed the experience in custom apps or sites. Capture applicant responses about loans, collateral assets, and financial details in Discovery Framework assessments for further processing, and to support auditing and traceability during compliance checks.

notes.feature_name: Digital Lending Template
notes.description: Template for Digital Lending to streamline the onboarding of intermediary firms and their employees.

notes.feature_name: Streamline Loan Application Intake and Audit with Discovery Framework
notes.description: Use Discovery Framework to create questionnaires for customers applying for secured or unsecured loans, capturing responses for further processing and compliance checks.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions with Digital Lending

notes.feature_name: Simplify Intermediary Firm Onboarding for Digital Lending
notes.description: Automated workflows for due diligence, verification, and approval to speed up registration for intermediary firms, tracking every step in one portal.

notes.feature_name: Automate Intermediary Employee Onboarding for Loans
notes.description: Register intermediary employees using an online form to trigger an automated approval process, including KYC and background checks.

notes.feature_name: Accelerate Loan Application Intake for Intermediary Employees
notes.description: Guided workflows for intermediary loan originators to start new loan applications and view status directly in the Intermediary Portal, improving collaboration and reducing errors.

notes.feature_name: Simplify Intermediary Firm Onboarding for Digital Lending
notes.description: Speed up registration for intermediary firms with automated workflows for due diligence, verification, and approval. Track every step, document, and communication in one portal to keep the process transparent. Use integrations to check licenses and backgrounds, reducing manual work and risk. After approval, automatically set up the intermediary account and transfer employee management to the firm admin.

notes.feature_name: Automate Intermediary Employee Onboarding for Loans
notes.description: Register intermediary employees by using an online form to trigger an automated approval process based on their role. Include Know Your Customer (KYC) and background checks to meet compliance requirements. Reduce manual work by automatically assigning permissions and granting access to loan application tools after approval.

notes.feature_name: Accelerate Loan Application Intake for Intermediary Employees
notes.description: Help intermediary loan originators start new loan applications and view status directly in the Intermediary Portal. Guided workflows lead them through data entry and document uploads to ensure completeness and reduce errors. Lenders can monitor the application lifecycle from submission to underwriting and assign action items for follow-up. This shared visibility reduces inquiries to relationship managers and improves collaboration between partners and processing teams.

notes.feature_name: Service Process Automation
notes.description: Use the prebuilt financial service process templates to help you get started. Upgrade the service process self-service experience for customer community users with the enhanced Financial Services Client Portal template. From AI-generated knowledge summaries to context-aware quick chats and service processes catalog, deliver intelligent, connected support experiences with ease.

notes.feature_name: Build Service Processes Faster with Prebuilt Templates in Unified Catalog
notes.description: Access prebuilt financial service process templates in Unified Catalog and deploy them with a single click to include all associated data, metadata, and dependencies. While you can still create service processes in Service Process Studio, creating service process definitions from prebuilt templates is now unique to the Unified Catalog.
notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Financial Services

notes.feature_name: Speed Up Resolutions for Service Processes with Agentic Self-Service
notes.description: Unify the customer self-service experience in the Financial Services Client portal template with new AI-powered components. Your users can view AI-generated summaries and the most common related questions, ranked by popularity, directly on a service process knowledge article page. Select a word or phrase in a service process knowledge article to trigger a quick chat that uses this context to provide context-aware answers. In addition, with the Associated Service Processes component, users can launch actions, such as order a checkbook, from relevant articles.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Financial Services
notes.security_notes: This feature is available to users with a Customer Community or Customer Community Plus license, and with a Knowledge license when accessing knowledge-related features. Site builders need the appropriate permissions to configure the Dynamic Q&A component in Experience Builder.

notes.feature_name: Transaction Dispute Management
notes.description: Capture complete details for automated clearing house (ACH) disputes with a guided questionnaire. Submit disputes for unlisted transactions, and retain your selections as you move through the intake form. Speed up the Mastercard® dispute stage setup process with a preconfigured stage definition template.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Financial Services

notes.feature_name: Expand Your Dispute Intake to ACH Transactions
notes.description: Collect detailed information from the start for Automated Clearing House (ACH) disputes. Extend the prebuilt guided dispute intake form to capture ACH disputes alongside card transactions. The intake form includes specific questions tailored for ACH cases to reduce data entry errors.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Financial Services

notes.feature_name: Increase Dispute Intake Flexibility for Service Representatives
notes.description: Service representatives can now create transactions directly in the dispute intake form for immediate dispute submission. This flexibility expands dispute coverage to transactions that aren't available for selection, such as those transactions not yet recorded in the core banking system.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Financial Services

notes.feature_name: Accelerate Mastercard Dispute Stage Setup with a Prebuilt Template
notes.description: Set up a compliant dispute process quickly by using the new stage management template for Mastercard. The template auto-populates the stage definition with preconfigured steps and transitions. The steps automatically point to the correct Omniscripts and integration definitions to eliminate manual mapping errors.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions with Agentforce Financial Services

notes.feature_name: Accelerate Mastercard Dispute Stage Setup with a Prebuilt Template
notes.description: Set up a compliant dispute process quickly by using the new stage management template for Mastercard. The template auto-populates the stage definition with preconfigured steps and transitions. notes.feature_name: New Agentforce Financial Services Jumpstart Bundles
notes.description: Quickly get started with Agentforce Financial Services, formerly Financial Services Cloud, by using preconfigured features and flows designed to reduce setup time and complexity.

notes.description: Do more with new and updated Agentforce Financial Services, formerly Financial Services Cloud, objects.

notes.feature_name: Flexible Hierarchy
notes.description: Use the new Flexible Hierarchy object to represent a unique entity within the hierarchy, such as a company, a subsidiary, a branch unit, or an individual person.

notes.feature_name: Flexible Hierarchy Node
notes.description: Use the new Flexible Hierarchy Node object to represent the type of relationship between any two nodes in a hierarchy.

notes.feature_name: Flexible Hierarchy Node Relation
notes.description: Use the new Flexible Hierarchy Node Relation object to represent the type of relationship between any two nodes in a hierarchy.

notes.feature_name: Onboarding Data Object Group
notes.description: Use the new Onboarding Data Object Group object to define configurations that group fields for specific business purposes.

notes.feature_name: Onboarding Data Object Group Version
notes.description: Use the new Onboarding Data Object Group Version object to track different versions of an onboarding data object group.

notes.feature_name: Onboarding Data Object
notes.description: Use the new Onboarding Data Object object to represent individual objects within an onboarding data object group.

notes.feature_name: Onboarding Data Object Field
notes.description: Use the new Onboarding Data Object Field object to represent a field in an onboarding data object group.

notes.feature_name: Connect REST API for Flexible Hierarchies
notes.description: Ensure your flexible hierarchies are in Draft status and meet data model constraints before processing. Validate multiple flexible hierarchies asynchronously by making a POST request to the /connect/flexible-hierarchies/actions/bulk-validate resource. New request body: Flexible Hierarchy Bulk Validation Input. New response body: Flexible Hierarchy Bulk Validation Details.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Health
notes.description: Discover, set up, and track usage of Agentforce Health, formerly Health Cloud, with Salesforce Go.
notes.breaking_changes: Health Cloud is now Agentforce Health. You may see references to Health Cloud in our application and documentation.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce for Payer Contact Center
notes.description: Summarize claim and member coverage details by using Agentforce for Payer Contact Center. Improve data extraction accuracy by using custom extraction templates.

notes.feature_name: Home Health Enhancements
notes.description: Secure data continuity through offline assessments by using Home Health. Promote scheduling flexibility and resource optimization by managing patient care across multiple addresses. Capture assessment data offline to maintain workflow efficiency and secure critical data integrity in any setting.

notes.feature_name: Integrated Care Management Enhancements
notes.description: Give care managers data-driven suggested responses for Discovery Framework-based internal assessments and Milliman Care Guidelines (MCG) assessments. Boost community engagement and improve assessment completion rates by exposing MCG assessments on Experience Cloud sites.

notes.feature_name: Utilization Management Enhancements
notes.description: Quickly identify and resolve duplicate prior authorization request cases to ensure clean and accurate data. Accelerate the approval of non-duplicate prior authorization requests by using the new deduplication flow.

notes.feature_name: Disease Surveillance Enhancements
notes.description: Gain a complete view of disease trends, identify outbreak warnings, and monitor critical metrics using the integrated data analytics and visualization dashboards within the Disease Surveillance app.

notes.feature_name: Data Cloud for Health Cloud
notes.description: Easily integrate Data Cloud with Health Cloud by using the new HealthCloud Provider and Utilization Management data kits.

notes.feature_name: New and Changed Connect REST API Resources in Health Cloud
notes.description: Connect REST APIs help customers, and partners integrate with Salesforce software and UIs.

notes.feature_name: Health Cloud Voice of the Customer Enhancements
notes.description: You asked, we listened. Maximize your success by using these enhancements inspired by your feedback.

notes.feature_name: New and Changed Objects in Health Cloud
notes.description: Store and access more data with these new and changed Health Cloud objects.

notes.feature_name: Action Launcher
notes.description: Extend action recommendations by using contextual information from service records to determine user intent.

notes.feature_name: Action Plans
notes.description: Customize the quick actions on an action plan template record page. Include document checklist items in actions plans for financial accounts. Learn about the life events in a client’s household at a glance.

notes.feature_name: Actionable Relationship Center
notes.description: View many-to-one relationship type records on an Actionable Relationship Center (ARC) graph.

notes.feature_name: Batch Management
notes.description: Use related object fields to control eligibility criteria and to group records for processing. Make the most of the new enhancements to fast-track batch job runs.

notes.feature_name: Business Rules Engine
notes.description: Experience improved scalability in decision tables with increased limits for invocations, output results, columns, and row processing. Expression sets enhancements include support for the IF function, automatic element naming, proactive alerts for constraint violations, and improved Salesforce Flow integration.

notes.feature_name: Criteria-Based Search and Filter
notes.description: Use Criteria-Based Search and Filter to design a search experience for your users. You can configure a search based on a single object that unifies complex sets of data, such as inventory and aggregated customer information that’s otherwise spread across multiple objects and fields. Criteria-Based Search and Filter can be customized to meet varied business requirements.

notes.feature_name: Data Processing Engine
notes.description: Preview how your definitions transform data and instantly validate and debug definition design right for the builder. Create and run definitions in Data 360 companion orgs. Use a unified view to track the performance and key metrics of definitions. Get actionable recommendations for failed runs and download failed records to debug faster. Find and focus the Data Processing Engine canvas on nodes that you want to work on.

notes.feature_name: Discovery Framework
notes.description: Easily present forms in the user's preferred language by storing assessment questions and responses in multiple languages. Save time by creating assessment questions with Generative AI.

notes.feature_name: Simplify Health Cloud Feature Discovery and Setup
notes.description: With Salesforce Go, discover and set up Health Cloud features, and track feature usage, all from a single location in Setup. Learn more about features and get help with configuration by accessing content resources and links.
notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Health Cloud

notes.feature_name: Agentforce for Health Cloud
notes.description: Find and summarize claim and member coverage details quickly by using Agentforce for Payer Contact Center. Increase efficiency by updating athenahealth patient records directly from Health Cloud.

notes.feature_name: Access Member Plans and Eligibility Data by Using Agent Actions
notes.description: Help your payer contact center reps quickly address member and provider questions about coverage, eligibility, and cost shares. New member coverage actions use structured data from Data 360 to summarize and query coverage details, so your reps can accurately address common member concerns about plan details and covered services.

notes.feature_name: Add Agentforce to Payer Contact Center Quickly
notes.description: Set up Agentforce for your payer contact center by using a guided setup, and make sure that your contact center reps are productive from day one. Create a data graph, review flows, and configure agent topics and actions by following the easy-to-understand steps. Stay focused and on task by using the direct links to the in-app setup pages and comprehensive help articles.

notes.feature_name: Resolve Claims Queries Faster by Using Data 360 Zero-Copy Claims Actions
notes.description: Give your payer contact center reps the tools to resolve member and provider claims queries more efficiently by using adjudicated claims data. By using Data 360 claims actions, agents can now fetch adjudicated claim records directly from external systems via zero-copy integration. Agents can use the adjudicated claim records to provide payer contact center reps quick access to high-level summaries and specific claim details, such as status, denial reasons, and patient responsibility.

notes.feature_name: Update athenahealth Patient Records Directly from Health Cloud
notes.description: Connect Health Cloud and the athenahealth Electronic Health Records (EHR) to support real-time data write-back for patient records. Eliminate context switching and duplicate data entry, and give your care team immediate access to the most current patient data. Improve the efficiency and the overall quality of care by helping your care team capture and share the most up-to-date patient information from your Health Cloud org.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Case Management Enhancements
notes.description: Streamline case handling, reduce repeat calls, and ensure accurate patient data by managing key updates directly within Agentforce. Help your contact center reps quickly add caregiver details, update patient information such as demographics and caregiver information, and send medication refill requests, all in one place. Strengthen service quality by ensuring reps always have current patient information, enabling faster and more efficient patient interaction, smoother hand off across teams, and stronger first-call resolution.

notes.feature_name: Document AI for Health
notes.description: The Intelligent Document Processing feature is now called Document AI. All existing document extraction capabilities remain unchanged.

notes.feature_name: Custom Document Extraction Templates
notes.description: Help your public health investigators and case intake specialists process a wider range of documents, including PDF, JPG, and PNG files, by using custom extraction templates for specific healthcare scenarios. Improve operational efficiency, reduce manual data entry, and get faster access to accurate, structured data that maps correctly to your Health Cloud data model.

notes.feature_name: Confidence Scores for Extracted Data
notes.description: Improve extraction accuracy and save review time with a confidence score next to each extracted field. Help your public health investigators and case intake specialists identify values that fall within a defined low-confidence range and require an additional manual review. Strengthen validation, minimize errors, and maintain high-quality health records by concentrating efforts only on fields that require attention.

notes.feature_name: Real-Time Extraction Preview
notes.description: Ensure faster and accurate template creation by using a real-time playground to validate extraction behavior and experiment with prompt variations during template setup. Preview extracted results instantly by uploading a sample file to confirm the accuracy of the results before saving them. Identify missing or incorrect fields early in the process to reduce trial and error. Improve data quality and deliver cleaner, structured outputs that align with the Health Cloud data model.

notes.feature_name: Member Plans and Eligibility Data Access

notes.feature_name: Analyze Disease Trends and Critical Cases with Analytics Dashboards
notes.description: Get comprehensive data analytics and visualization capabilities by using the dashboards in the Disease Surveillance Analytics app. You can visualize key disease case trends, identify potential warnings that cause outbreaks, and monitor critical metrics such as hospitalizations and mortality. Use the dashboards to analyze case trends and use Agentforce actions to conduct deeper investigations and understand disease spread.

notes.feature_name: Simplify Coordination of Home Healthcare Across Patient Locations

If the preferred address isn't linked to the patient, schedulers can easily add it during the scheduling process. This flexibility helps to save the time and effort involved in navigating through multiple pages.

Schedulers can use work plan templates and work plan steps to add instructions when they schedule visits. Beyond selecting standard work plan templates, schedulers can also create custom templates to assign patient-specific instructions. For dependent visits, schedulers can add contextual instructions tailored for each involved care resource.

notes.feature_name: Enhance Health Outcomes with Offline Home Healthcare Assessments

Provide uninterrupted care services and capture critical data, regardless of where the care is delivered.

Reduce manual data entry by getting suggested responses for assessment questions based on sources such as previous responses and Einstein Generative AI. Care managers can review, accept, or dismiss the suggested responses.

notes.feature_name: Boost Patient Engagement with MCG Assessments for Experience Cloud Sites
notes.description: Deliver a more engaging and improved patient experience by exposing MCG assessments to Experience Cloud sites. Care managers can securely send MCG assessments to community members via email. Then, members can complete the assessments on the Experience Cloud site in their own time, without having to visit a clinic or hospital. Improve assessment completion rates by making assessments more accessible and flexible.

notes.feature_name: Prevent Data Loss by Automatically Saving Assessments
notes.description: Help care managers administer assessments without worrying about data loss with autosave for Discovery Framework-based internal assessments and MCG assessments. As care managers enter assessment responses, the assessment is automatically saved every few seconds. They can also leave the assessment and later resume exactly where they left off, as the assessment is saved with an In Progress status.

notes.feature_name: Streamline Care Plan Updates with the Enhanced Workflow
notes.description: Get a clean and structured care plan and reduce administrative overhead when you update care plan elements. Care managers can add new problems, goals, and interventions to a care plan’s existing hierarchy without duplicating the care plan elements.

notes.feature_name: Facilitate Payer Collaboration with Authorized Care Data Access
notes.description: Enhance alignment with payer workflows with the new Member Plan Care Plan, Member Plan Medication Statement, and Purchaser Plan Care Program objects. These objects ensure that care teams have quick and secure access to care data tied to the specific member plans and purchaser plans that they’re authorized for.

notes.feature_name: Optimize Smart Patient Care with Suggested Assessment Responses
notes.description: Help care managers administer assessments faster by enabling suggested responses for Discovery Framework-based internal assessments and Milliman Care Guidelines (MCG) assessments. Reduce manual data entry by getting suggested responses for assessment questions based on sources such as previous responses and Einstein Generative AI. Care managers can review, accept, or dismiss the suggestions to ensure human oversight and deliver an improved patient experience.
notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with the Health Cloud and Agentforce for Health Cloud add-on licenses

notes.feature_name: MCG Assessments for Experience Cloud Sites
notes.description: Deliver a more engaging and improved patient experience by exposing MCG assessments to Experience Cloud sites. Care managers can securely send MCG assessments to community members via email. Then, members can complete the assessments on the Experience Cloud site in their own time, without having to visit a clinic or hospital. Improve assessment completion rates by making assessments more accessible and flexible.
notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Health Cloud

notes.description: Help care managers administer assessments without worrying about data loss with autosave for Discovery Framework-based internal assessments and MCG assessments. As care managers enter assessment responses, the assessment is automatically saved every few seconds. They can also leave the assessment and later resume exactly where they left off, as the assessment is saved with an In Progress status.
notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Health Cloud

notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Health Cloud

notes.feature_name: Facilitate Payer Collaboration with Authorized Care Data Access
notes.description: Enhance alignment with payer workflows with the new Member Plan Care Plan, Member Plan Medication Statement, and Purchaser Plan Care Program objects. These objects ensure that care teams have quick and secure access to care data tied to the specific member plans and purchaser plans that they’re authorized for.
notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Health Cloud

notes.feature_name: Utilization Management Enhancements
notes.description: Quickly identify and resolve duplicate prior authorization request cases to ensure clean and accurate data. Accelerate the approval of non-duplicate prior authorization requests by using the new deduplication flow. Safeguard Data Integrity By Resolving Duplicate Prior Authorization Request Cases. Improve payer workflow and ensure clean and accurate prior authorization request data. Close duplicate prior authorization request cases by using the new Identify and Resolve Duplicate Prior Authorization Request Cases flow. Detect potential duplicate case records and present the records to users for quick comparison and resolution. Instantly Approve Non-Duplicate Prior Authorization Requests. Reduce manual review time for payers and accelerate prior authorization approvals by using the Automatically Approve Prior Authorization Requests flow. The flow uses an expression set to instantly approve requests.

notes.feature_name: Identify and Resolve Duplicate Prior Authorization Request Cases
notes.description: Improve payer workflow and ensure clean and accurate prior authorization request data. Close duplicate prior authorization request cases by using the new Identify and Resolve Duplicate Prior Authorization Request Cases flow. Detect potential duplicate case records and present the records to users for quick comparison and resolution.
notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with the Health Cloud and Data Cloud add-on licenses

notes.feature_name: Automatically Approve Prior Authorization Requests
notes.description: Reduce manual review time for payers and accelerate prior authorization approvals by using the Automatically Approve Prior Authorization Requests flow. The flow uses an expression set to instantly approve eligible non-duplicate prior authorization requests, updates the claim status to Approved, and closes the associated case. Ensure faster service and improve satisfaction for members and providers by reducing administrative burdens.
notes.edition: Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Health Cloud

notes.feature_name: Connect REST API Resources in Health Cloud
notes.description: Connect REST APIs help customers, and partners integrate with Salesforce software and UIs. Fetch historical assessment response data for healthcare applications, including Discovery Framework and external Milliman Care Guidelines (MCG) assessments. Make a POST request to the new resource: /connect/assessment/previousResponses.

notes.feature_name: Invocable Actions in Health Cloud
notes.description: Use the new invocable actions in Health Cloud. Create a template service appointment with a status of Cancelled to manually schedule home visits using the createTemplateOfServiceAppt action. Schedule multiple addresses for the home visits manually using the workPlanTemplateId and serviceAppointmentAddress with the scheduleHomeVisitsManually action. Schedule service appointments for recurring home visits using user-defined home visit address with the workPlanTemplateId and serviceAppointmentAddress with the scheduleRecurringHomeVisit action.

notes.feature_name: Health Cloud Voice of the Customer Enhancements
notes.description: You asked, we listened. Maximize your success by using these enhancements inspired by your feedback.

notes.feature_name: Care Facility Bed Related List
notes.description: Care Facility Bed is now available as a related list for Healthcare Facility records.

notes.feature_name: Clinical Service Request History and Clinical Service Requests with Activities
notes.description: You can now select Clinical Service Request History or Clinical Service Requests with Activities as custom report types.

notes.feature_name: Custom Reports for Provider Contracts
notes.description: To support reporting on rate structures assigned to provider contracts, you can now use these objects in custom reports: Contract Payment Agreement as a child of Contract, Capitation Care Fee Agreement as a child of Contract Payment Agreement, Bundled Care Fee Agreement as a child of Contract Payment Agreement, Categorized Care Fee Agreement as a child of Contract Payment Agreement, Shared Saving Payment Agreement as a child of Contract Payment Agreement, Preventive Care Agreement as a child of Contract Payment Agreement, Standard Care Fee Agreement as a child of Contract Payment Agreement, Percentile Based Care Fee Agreement as a child of Contract Payment Agreement, Fee Schedule Definition as a child of Contract Payment Agreement, Care Fee Schedule Item as a child of Fee Schedule Definition.

notes.feature_name: Care Specialty to Taxonomy Relationship
notes.description: To show the Care Specialty to Taxonomy relationship on the Provider page layout, we added a standard lookup relationship between Care Specialty and Taxonomy. Care Specialty Taxonomy is now available as a child of Care Specialty and Care Taxonomy for custom report types.

notes.feature_name: DocumentExtractionDef Object
notes.description: Represent a predefined framework or configuration for automating document data extraction. It contains essential meta data such as the definition's name, description, and status. It supports versioning, which allows different configurations to be created and used for various document extraction needs.

notes.feature_name: DocumentExtractionDefVer
notes.description: Parameters for data extraction. Each version captures a unique setup, allowing users to manage and adapt document extraction to their needs.

notes.feature_name: FrequencyType on CoverageBenefit
notes.description: Specify the frequency type of the coverage benefit associated with the home healthcare visit. Use the new FrequencyType field on the CoverageBenefit object.

notes.feature_name: TotalBenefitAmount on CoverageBenefit
notes.description: Specify the total amount of the coverage benefit associated with the home healthcare visit. Use the new TotalBenefitAmount field on the CoverageBenefit object.

notes.feature_name: FrequencyType on CoverageBenefitItem
notes.description: Specify the frequency type of the coverage benefit item associated with the home healthcare visit. Use the new FrequencyType field on the CoverageBenefitItem object.

notes.feature_name: FrequencyType on PlanBenefit
notes.description: Specify the frequency type of the plan benefit associated with the home healthcare visit. Use the new FrequencyType field on the PlanBenefit object.

notes.feature_name: TotalBenefitAmount on PlanBenefit
notes.description: Specify the total amount of the plan benefit associated with the home healthcare visit. Use the new TotalBenefitAmount field on the PlanBenefit object.

notes.feature_name: FrequencyType on PlanBenefitItem
notes.description: Specify the frequency type of the plan benefit item associated with the home healthcare visit. Use the new FrequencyType field on the PlanBenefitItem object.

notes.feature_name: MemberPlanCarePlan
notes.description: Represent a junction between member plans and care plans. Define the problems, goals, and interventions in a care plan based on the patient's health plan coverage. Use the new MemberPlanCarePlan object.

notes.feature_name: MemberPlanMedicationStmt
notes.description: Represent a junction between member plans and medication statements. Associate the medications that a patient is currently taking or has taken in the past with their health plan coverage. Use the new MemberPlanMedicationStmt object.

notes.feature_name: PurchaserPlanCareProgram
notes.description: Represent a junction between purchaser plans and care programs. Define the care programs that are available under a purchaser plan such as employer-sponsored programs for managing chronic conditions. Use the new PurchaserPlanCareProgram object.

notes.feature_name: Use Digital Insurance Alongside the Insurance Managed Package or Insurance CRM
notes.description: Launch new products faster on the flexible Digital Insurance platform while you manage existing products, policies, and claims in the same org. Eliminate the overhead of administering separate orgs or rebuilding custom integrations extensively. Manage products, quotes, policies, and claims using solution-specific workflows and keep the transactional data, metadata, and automations segregated based on the originating solution. Although Digital Insurance can coexist with Insurance CRM or the Insurance managed package, these solutions don't interoperate.

notes.feature_name: Accelerate Sales with Unified Multi-Root Insurance Quoting
notes.description: Create a single, comprehensive quote that includes multiple root products, such as Auto and Home. Captive agents can configure and price several products together and present them as a single offering. All lifecycle operations are managed at the parent policy level, and premiums and taxes aggregate from each child policy to deliver a consolidated financial overview. Use the multi-root issuance API (or invocable action) to create the parent and child policies upon quote acceptance. Manage subsequent renewals and endorsements at the parent policy level using the corresponding multi-root APIs or invocable actions.

notes.feature_name: Manage Policy Lifecycle Better with Enhanced Versioning
notes.description: Optimize policy issuance, renewals, endorsements, and cancellations with complete versioning. Simplify the tracking of policy changes and mid-term adjustments during endorsements, helping service teams stay aligned with carrier updates.

notes.feature_name: Agency Billing
notes.description: Manage the end-to-end agency billing workflow with greater accuracy, automation, and financial control across invoicing, payments, journals, and collections.

notes.feature_name: Enable Comparative Rating and Multiple Plan Selection
notes.description: The Product Selection Lightning Web Component for Omnistudio allows end users to effortlessly compare multiple rated insurance products and choose the optimal plan directly within a guided Omniscript flow. Quickly compare up to three different root products side-by-side to understand variations in coverages and pricing. This component passes multiple rating inputs to the Insurance Rating API, which rates several root products and returns the calculated premiums and details. The UI displays product cards showing the premium and taxes for each option.

notes.feature_name: Validate Complex Configurations with Constraint Rules Engine
notes.description: With Constraint Rules Engine (CRE), use constraint-based logic to validate complex product configurations. This feature supports deeply nested bundles, cross-product dependencies, and multi-instance insurance scenarios. CRE ensures accurate quoting by preventing invalid selections while you transition from Business Rules Engine to a constraint-driven model. For Insurance, Constraint Rules Engine is currently only supported for exclusions, clauses and configuration rules.

notes.feature_name: Simplify Quoting and Policy Configuration through Guided Flows
notes.description: With the Product Configuration Lightning Web Component, users can immediately see how policy attribute changes affect the premium, enabling efficient, real-time quote generation. This component for Omnistudio accepts multiple rating inputs and calls the Insurance Rating POST and PATCH APIs to update attribute values for specific coverages.

notes.feature_name: Track Policy Limits with Flexible Duration Types
notes.description: Reset policy limits at the end of a calendar year or on a specific override date, or enforce lifetime limits that don’t reset. Previously, you could only reset limits at the end of a policy term.

notes.feature_name: Cap Payments at the Lowest Limit for Loss Claims
notes.description: Adjusters can now determine the correct payable amount without manual calculations before they request approvals. Enforce the lowest remaining limit, and track consumption across sub-coverage, coverage, and policy levels for loss-type payments. Prevent failed payments, recalculations, and messy audit trails.

notes.feature_name: Revise Claim Coverage Payment Details to Make Corrections
notes.description: Edit details such as the payee or the claim amount for a claim coverage payment. Calculate the new adjusted amount and update the limit tracking for accurate audit trails. Previously, you deleted a claim coverage payment detail record and created a new one to update details.

notes.feature_name: Issue Ex Gratia Payments for Loss Claims
notes.description: Authorize exceptional payments for loss claims that exceed the policy or coverage limits. Track ex gratia payments for auditability while capping consumption at the remaining limit. Handle special circumstances and maintain positive customer relations without manual workarounds or negative balances.

notes.feature_name: Copy Data Between Nodes in a Pricing Procedure
notes.description: Gather the required data for price calculations by copying attributes to a node from its parent, child, or other related nodes. Previously, you could only aggregate numerical attributes from related nodes as a workaround but couldn’t access the text attributes. For example, when calculating the premium for collision coverage, add attributes from the product, vehicle, and driver nodes to the coverage node to compile the data for the calculation.

notes.feature_name: Connect REST APIs
notes.description: Use the Insurance Connect REST APIs to manage insurance life cycle, such as multi-root policies and claims. A multi-root policy includes multiple child policies of different product types under a single parent policy.

notes.feature_name: New and Changed Connect in Apex Classes
notes.description: Use the new methods to manage multi-root insurance policies and claims. Learn about the new properties that are added to the existing input and output classes.

notes.feature_name: New Invocable Actions in Insurance
notes.description: Use the new invocable actions in Insurance to create and manage multi-root insurance policies.

notes.feature_name: Use Digital Insurance Alongside the Insurance Managed Package or Insurance CRM
notes.description: Launch new products faster on the flexible Digital Insurance platform while you manage existing products, policies, and claims in the same org. Eliminate the overhead of administering separate orgs or rebuilding custom integrations extensively. Manage products, quotes, policies, and claims using solution-specific workflows and keep the transactional data, metadata, and automations segregated based on the originating solution. Although Digital Insurance can coexist with Insurance CRM or the Insurance managed package, these solutions don't interoperate.

All lifecycle operations are managed at the parent policy level, and premiums and taxes aggregate from each child policy to deliver a consolidated financial overview. Use the multi-root issuance API (or invocable action) to create the parent and child policies upon quote acceptance. Manage subsequent renewals and endorsements at the parent policy level using the corresponding multi-root APIs or invocable actions.

notes.description: Optimize policy issuance, renewals, endorsements, and cancellations with complete versioning. Simplify the tracking of policy changes and mid-term adjustments during endorsements, helping service teams stay aligned with carrier updates.

notes.feature_name: Agency Billing
notes.description: Manage the end-to-end agency billing workflow with greater accuracy, automation, and financial control across invoicing, payments, journals, and collections.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions of Insurance Brokerage User Addon

notes.feature_name: Automate Agency Billing Journals
notes.description: Strengthen financial accuracy and control by defining accounting periods for each legal entity by maintaining a chart of accounts. Then, automatically generate dual-entry journal entries based on billing transaction types and general ledger assignment rules.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions of Insurance Brokerage User Addon

notes.feature_name: Streamline Cash Flow with Automated Payment Processing
notes.description: Automate the collection of payments for policy invoices and processing of refunds for policy changes or cancellations. Settle open balances promptly and maintain accurate financial reporting by applying payments directly to policy invoices.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions of Insurance Brokerage User Addon

notes.feature_name: Stay on Top of Overdue Premiums with Collections
notes.description: Manage overdue invoices and reduce the risk of unpaid premiums with Collections. Easily see outstanding policy invoices, follow up on missed payments, and record payment commitments from policyholders. Automated reminder emails help recover overdue amounts more efficiently and support steady cash flow.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions of Insurance Brokerage User Addon

notes.feature_name: Schedule and Generate Invoices for Insurance Policies
notes.description: Easily configure billing preferences for insurance policies, including tax and proration policies, in a purpose-built object. Set up invoice schedulers to generate invoices at regular intervals or generate on-demand invoices.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions of Insurance Brokerage User Addon

notes.feature_name: Generate Policy Transactions and Breakdowns
notes.description: Automatically generate policy transactions and detailed breakdowns to reflect the financial impact of policy events. The transaction breakdown provides a clear view of insurance premium, commissions, taxes, and fees drawn from coverages, insured items, and insured parties.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions of Insurance Brokerage User Addon

notes.feature_name: Effortlessly Configure Billing Settings for Insurance Policies
notes.description: Simplify the management of insurance policy transactions by using the Billing Setup panel to quickly enable transaction and transaction-detail generation for policy lifecycle events. You can also configure and customise the context mappings that are used to create billing schedules.
notes.edition: Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited editions of Insurance Brokerage User Addon

notes.feature_name: Link a policy transaction to a prior transaction

notes.feature_name: OverrideDate Field

notes.feature_name: RecordSource Field for Quote

notes.feature_name: Insurance Connect REST APIs
notes.description: Use the Insurance Connect REST APIs to manage insurance life cycle, such as multi-root policies and claims. A multi-root policy includes multiple child policies of different product types under a single parent policy.

notes.feature_name: New Connect REST APIs in Insurance
notes.description: Learn more about the new resources available with Insurance to manage multi-root insurance policies. Use the claims resources to edit an existing claim coverage payment detail record, recalculate adjustments for a loss item, and pay ex gratia amount.

notes.feature_name: Changed Connect REST API Request Bodies
notes.description: Use the new properties in insurance to specify the sub-coverage during calculating adjustments for a loss item, provide either the date or both the date and time of reported loss.

notes.feature_name: Changed Connect REST API Response Bodies
notes.description: Use the new properties in Insurance to track the claim loss date, see the rule set evaluation results during multi-root policy processing, and track the start and end dates for the standings evaluation period.

notes.feature_name: Pay ex gratia amount for a claim coverage payment detail record
notes.description: Make a PATCH request to the /connect/insurance/claims/claimId/coverages/coverageId/payment-details/paymentDetailId/pay-ex-gratia resource. New request body: Pay Ex Gratia Claim Coverage Payment Detail Input. New response body: Pay Ex Gratia Claim Coverage Payment Detail.

notes.feature_name: Modify an existing claim coverage payment detail record for both loss and expense types
notes.description: Make a PATCH request to the /connect/insurance/claims/claimId/coverages/coverageId/payment-details/paymentDetailId resource. New request body: Edit Claim Coverage Payment Detail Input. New response body: Edit Claim Coverage Payment Detail Response.

notes.feature_name: Recalculate adjustments for an existing payment detail record
notes.description: Make a PATCH request to the existing /connect/insurance/claims/claimId/coverages/coverageId/calculate-adjustments resource. New request body: Recalculate Adjustments Input.

notes.feature_name: Create a multi-root insurance policy asynchronously
notes.description: Make a POST request to the /connect/insurance/policies/multi-root resource.

notes.feature_name: Endorse a multi-root insurance policy asynchronously
notes.description: Make a POST request to the /connect/insurance/policies/policyId/multi-root/endorse resource.

notes.feature_name: Renew a multi-root insurance policy asynchronously
notes.description: Make a POST request to the /connect/insurance/policies/policyId/multi-root/renew resource.

notes.feature_name: Changed Connect REST API Request Bodies
notes.description: Use the new properties in insurance to specify the sub-coverage during calculating adjustments for a loss item, provide either the date or both the date and time of reported loss. These request bodies have these new properties: Calculate Adjustments Input (benefitName — Name of the specific benefit or sub-coverage that's associated with the coverage, as defined in the product attribute mapping), Claim Input (claimLossDate — Date when the loss occurred. This parameter doesn't accept time of reported loss), Insurance Policy Limit Current Standings Input (trackingDate — Date on which insurance standing is evaluated).
affected_components: Insurance Policy Limit Current Standings Input

notes.feature_name: Changed Connect REST API Response Bodies
notes.description: Use the new properties in Insurance to track the claim loss date, see the rule set evaluation results during multi-root policy processing, and track the start and end dates for the standings evaluation period. These response bodies have these new properties: Claim Details - claimLossDate — Date when the loss occurred. Insurance Policy Limit Calculation Standing Node - trackingStartDate — Start date of the duration period that’s used to calculate the current standing, trackingEndDate — End date of the duration period that’s used to calculate the current standing. Insurance Invoke Underwriting Rule - ruleSetResult — List of underwriting rule set evaluation results for multi-root policy processing. Process Policy Limits Response - exceededAmount — Amount that exceeds the remaining available policy limit in the specified limit currency, exceededCount — Count of coverage units beyond the policy’s allowed unit limit.

notes.feature_name: New and Changed Connect in Apex Classes
notes.description: Use the new methods to manage multi-root insurance policies and claims. Learn about the new properties that are added to the existing input and output classes. These new methods are available in the existing ConnectApi.InsurancePolicyAdminFamily class.

notes.feature_name: Enhanced Next Best Customer component
notes.description: Boost user engagement with the enhanced Next Best Customer component.

notes.feature_name: Activity Measure workflow enhancement
notes.description: Use the enhanced Activity Measure workflow to track a wider range of activities.

notes.feature_name: Remote visit capabilities
notes.description: Boost engagement efficiency with new remote visit capabilities, AI-based and voice-based data capture, and a centralized Visit Management experience in the Service Console.

notes.feature_name: Collaborative Medical Insights
notes.description: Drive informed execution and mitigate risks effectively with Collaborative Medical Insights.

notes.feature_name: Deep Links in Life Sciences Cloud Mobile App
notes.description: Increase your efficiency by using deep links to streamline navigation and automate task execution in the Life Sciences Cloud mobile app.

notes.feature_name: Store Check and Remote Engagement with Microsoft Teams
notes.description: Life Sciences Cloud offers the Store Check and Remote Engagement with Microsoft Teams features through limited pilots. Participation in these pilots is optional and at your organization’s discretion.

notes.feature_name: Streamline Account Management with Data 360
notes.description: Streamline Account Management by integrating Data 360 with Life Sciences Cloud using the Life Sciences data kit. Boost user engagement with the enhanced Next Best Customer component. Align out-of-territory accounts to your territory directly on the desktop site.

notes.feature_name: Transform Life Sciences Data with Data 360
notes.description: Seamlessly integrate Data 360 with Life Sciences Cloud by using the Life Sciences data kit. Streamline your Account Management data by using the preconfigured data stream bundles that harmonize data from various objects. The data kit includes five ready-to-use bundles: Activity Plan, Marketable Product, Presentation, Provider Visit, and Sales Territory Account.

notes.feature_name: Improve User Engagement with Prioritized Accounts
notes.description: Help your users focus on the right accounts with the enhanced Next Best Customer component. The updated display offers clearer scoring visibility, intuitive rationales, and richer account insights, powered by the Actionable Relationship Center (ARC) framework. The ARC framework enables a more flexible and informative display of account details, allowing you to make faster and more informed engagement decisions. You can configure the rationale display and related settings directly from the Admin Console.

notes.feature_name: View and Align Out-of-Territory Accounts on the Desktop Site
notes.description: Now view and align accounts outside your current territory directly from affiliation lists on the desktop site. Manage your activities more efficiently with immediate access to summaries of affiliated accounts. Previously, this feature was available only on the Life Sciences Cloud mobile app.

notes.feature_name: Prioritized Accounts

notes.feature_name: Engagement Planning
notes.description: Give your users increased flexibility to adjust their activity plans. Track goal measures for a wider range of activities. Use new trigger handlers to update your activity plan goals and apply adjustment creation.

notes.feature_name: Make Quick, Ad Hoc Adjustments to Your Activity Plans
notes.description: Gain greater adaptability and flexibility in reaching your targets by submitting activity plan adjustment requests. Track activity types for accounts that aren't in your plan or set goals to track more activity types for your existing accounts. Revise the goal metrics to account for last-minute changes and remove accounts that can no longer be accommodated. Easily modify goals and enforce request creation limits by using new trigger handlers.
notes.edition: Lightning Experience in Enterprise and Unlimited editions with the Life Sciences Cloud license and the Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement add-on license, and where the Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement managed package is installed. Life Sciences Cloud mobile app for iOS (iPad only).

notes.feature_name: Achieve More Personalization with the Updated Activity Measure Workflow
notes.description: Evaluate goal metrics beyond visit-related activities with the enhanced activity measure workflow. Choose from a wider range of custom and standard objects to monitor your business-specific activities. Also, Activity Type Field and Activity Type Field Value are no longer mandatory for tracking metrics, helping you plan activities quickly without having to provide additional details.
notes.edition: Lightning Experience in Enterprise and Unlimited editions with the Life Sciences Cloud license.

notes.feature_name: Plan and run customer engagements more efficiently
notes.description: Plan and run customer engagements more efficiently with improved remote engagement as well as desktop and new AI features. Expand your remote engagement capabilities by conducting visits through Microsoft Teams and automatically capturing key details. Shape strategies and drive informed execution by capturing field observations and validating them through collaborative insights. Manage visit records from the new Visit List and see which attendees' primary account addresses match the visit location in the Attendees sidebar. Also, you can now open presentations and track engagement directly from the desktop Visit Engagement page. Sales reps and service agents can streamline workflows by managing visits within the Salesforce Service Console, alongside related records like accounts, cases, and medical inquiries.

notes.feature_name: Shape Strategies by Using Collaborative Medical Insights
notes.description: Capture observations directly from field interactions in the Life Sciences Cloud mobile app to understand trends and guide engagement strategies. Validate findings through peer upvoting and hierarchical grouping to make sure that high-priority concerns surface quickly. Drive informed execution plans in your team by using insights and shared knowledge to identify opportunities and mitigate risks effectively.

notes.feature_name: View Attendees with the Same Address in the Sidebar
notes.description: Quickly identify attendees linked to the same address by enabling Same-Address Attendees in the Attendee sidebar. When enabled, you can see at a glance which attendees share the same primary account addresses as the visit location.

notes.feature_name: Manage Visit Records in One Place
notes.description: Use the new Visit List View, available on the Visit tab, to manage schedules and record keeping. Sort, search, and filter upcoming visit records. You can also add samples and create new visits directly from a list view card.

notes.feature_name: Start Presentations and Track Engagement from Visits on the Desktop Site
notes.description: Your field users can now start presentations from the Visit Engagement page and navigate between the presentation player and the visit on the desktop site. Metrics about the slides presented and the linked products and messages are captured on the Visit Engagement page automatically, providing a more consistent experience. Previously, field users could conduct presentations and track engagement data from visits only in the Life Sciences Cloud mobile app.

notes.feature_name: Manage Visits from the Service Console
notes.description: Sales reps and service agents no longer have to switch between windows to manage visits.

notes.feature_name: Work with Visits in Service Console
notes.description: Now work with Visits directly in the Salesforce Service Console. Open Visits alongside accounts, cases, and medical inquiries, switch between records without losing context, and use quick actions to navigate between Visit sections and related records, such as Medical Inquiries and Expenses.

notes.feature_name: Filter Admin Console Tiles Based on User Permissions
notes.description: Show users only the tiles they need in the Admin Console by turning on Filter Admin Console Tiles Based On User Permissions. Use Life Sciences Customer Engagement Setup to make the change.

notes.description: The trigger handlers VisitConflictValidationHandler and DeleteVisitStdEventHandler are no longer available.

notes.feature_name: Intelligent Content
notes.description: Expand your search beyond just presentation names and metadata properties by searching within presentation content. Share presentations with healthcare professionals as unique links instead of as email attachments.

notes.feature_name: Share Presentations as Unique Email Links
notes.description: Maximize the impact of your content by enabling field users to send presentations as links in preapproved email templates. By using email links, healthcare professionals (HCPs) can view content in a dedicated portal without downloading email attachments. Manage when presentations are available so that HCPs always see the most up-to-date content, and maintain access controls by defining when links expire. Use rich engagement data—including pages viewed, time spent per page, and the HCP’s navigation path—to optimize presentations for future engagements.
notes.edition: Lightning Experience in Enterprise and Unlimited editions with the Life Sciences Cloud license and the Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement add-on license, and where the Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement managed package is installed.

notes.feature_name: Use Smart Content Search to Find Relevant Presentations
notes.description: Improve the quality of your search results by using Data 360 to create a search index of the content in presentation files. While online, field users can search for presentations by using either keywords or conceptual terms and phrases, making it easier to find the most relevant materials. Previously, search results included only standard keyword-based matches on presentation names and metadata properties.

notes.feature_name: Smart Content Search
notes.description: Improve the quality of your search results by using Data 360 to create a search index of the content in presentation files. While online, field users can search for presentations by using either keywords or conceptual terms and phrases, making it easier to find the most relevant materials. Previously, search results included only standard keyword-based matches on presentation names and metadata properties.
notes.edition: Lightning Experience in Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Data 360, the Life Sciences Cloud license, and the Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement add-on license.

notes.feature_name: Access Drug Distribution and Prescription Data
notes.description: Now access drug distribution data and prescription data on the Life Sciences Cloud mobile app. Gain deeper insights into your target customers, and plan effective interactions anytime, anywhere. Previously, this feature was available only on the web.
notes.edition: Lightning Experience in Enterprise and Unlimited editions with the Life Sciences Cloud license and the Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement add-on license.

notes.feature_name: Drive Efficiency in the Mobile App by Configuring Deep Links
notes.description: Construct URLs that create and populate records or send your users to the right spot in the Life Sciences Cloud mobile app from third-party apps. For example, create a deep link that composes an email with a preselected recipient and email template to standardize email communications from the field. Deep links work only for users who have the right access to that action, record, or area of the app.
notes.edition: Lightning Experience in Enterprise and Unlimited editions with the Life Sciences Cloud license and the Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement add-on license, and where the Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement managed package is installed. Life Sciences Cloud mobile app for iOS (iPad only).
