notes.description: Life Sciences Cloud offers the Store Check and Remote Engagement with Microsoft Teams features through limited pilots. Participation in these pilots is optional and at your organization’s discretion.
notes.edition: Lightning Experience in Enterprise and Unlimited editions with Data 360, Life Sciences Cloud license, Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement add-on license, and where the Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement managed package is installed. Life Sciences Cloud mobile app for iOS (iPad only).

notes.feature_name: Store Check (Pilot)
notes.description: Empower your field teams to move faster with real-time shelf insights, streamlined performance monitoring, and guided in-store execution directly within their workflow. Use Store Check to create products, assortments, high-level task types, and related key performance indicators, each with target values customized to your business needs. Sales reps can then use the Store Check page in the Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement mobile app to efficiently complete their in-store activities.
affected_components: Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement mobile app

notes.feature_name: Remote Engagement with Microsoft Teams (Pilot)
notes.description: Expand your remote engagement capabilities by using Microsoft Teams as a conferencing platform for remote sessions. Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement generates Microsoft Teams meeting links, and healthcare professionals can join remote sessions quickly by using their existing Microsoft Teams accounts on their mobile devices. During remote sessions, Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement captures details and metrics for the content shared.
affected_components: Life Sciences Cloud for Customer Engagement

notes.feature_name: Share presentations as unique links in email content
notes.description: Use the new CanSendPresentationLinks field on the existing LifeSciEmailTemplate object and the new AccessIdentifier field on the existing PresentationPartyAccess object.

notes.feature_name: Fetch historical assessment response data for healthcare applications
notes.description: Make a POST request to the new resource: /connect/assessment/previousResponses to fetch historical assessment response data for healthcare applications, including Discovery Framework and external Milliman Care Guidelines (MCG) assessments.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce for Manufacturing
notes.description: Scale operations and increase productivity with Agentforce for Manufacturing. New AI-driven capabilities support sales, service estimation, and proactive maintenance. Users can streamline product searches, quote creation, entitlement handling, and pricing calculations, while the agent reduces manual effort and ensures a more accurate outcome.

notes.feature_name: Manufacturing for Sales
notes.description: Optimize product sample management and streamline the full lifecycle from request to fulfillment and feedback within a unified ecosystem. Easily manage large sales agreements by viewing up to 20 product lines per page. Use enhanced filters to quickly narrow down associated products, making it faster to track, analyze, and update specific product details.

notes.feature_name: Manufacturing for Services
notes.description: Enhance operational efficiency with new capabilities that streamline inventory management. Allocate and count inventory with greater accuracy, manage time sheets, and accelerate recall handling with pre-built templates.

notes.feature_name: Allocate Inventory Efficiently Across Locations
notes.description: Manage inventory allocation for sales orders and work orders across multiple locations with accurate, real-time visibility. View stock statuses, such as on-hand, allocated, and available, and soft-reserve inventory for specific orders. Assign inventory to orders to prevent overcommitment, and maintain accurate inventory visibility, even during high-volume, concurrent transactions. This helps prevent stock conflicts, improves tracking accuracy, and supports smarter, more efficient fulfillment decisions.

notes.feature_name: Enhance Search Experience with Criteria-Based Search and Filter
notes.description: Criteria-Based Search and Filter (CBSF) now provides a more intuitive and reliable search experience with consistent data display and clear visibility into when data was last updated. Date-time fields appear in the user’s timezone using standard Salesforce formatting, and currency fields display symbols instead of codes. Any Word Search is enabled by default in all orgs, and users can view the Last Refreshed Date for search results, enhancing clarity and efficiency.

notes.feature_name: Extend Stage Management to Additional Manufacturing Objects
notes.description: Implement stage management across more Manufacturing objects such as Asset, Fleet, Appraisal, Appraisal Item, Product Service Campaign Group Definitions and Product Service Campaign Group Causal Item. Provide a structured, traceable, and controlled process for managing the life-cycle of Manufacturing business operations through defined stages. Maximize service efficiency, reduce turnaround time, and enhance customer lifetime value.

notes.feature_name: Optimize Channel Operations with Enhanced Channel Revenue Management
notes.description: Channel Revenue Management now provides enhanced control and efficiency across partner inventory and incentive programs. New features include Stock Rotation Incentives, allowing partners.

notes.feature_name: Incentive Budgets
notes.description: Incentive budgets can now be defined, allocated, and monitored across partners and programs, improving operational efficiency with integrated workflows for partner submission, eligibility validation, claim creation, and budget tracking.

notes.feature_name: Access Manufacturing Features and Setup in One Place
notes.description: Salesforce Go now supports a broader range of Manufacturing features that you can configure and manage from a single location in Setup, allowing for faster implementation and reduced context switching.

notes.feature_name: Action Launcher
notes.description: Make recommendations available in companion orgs to help teams quickly resolve customer issues. Deploy file-based data kits to configure Recommended Actions.

notes.feature_name: Asset Service Lifecycle Management
notes.description: Quickly find and manage inventory with enhanced batch-level details and search capabilities, improving accuracy and streamlining your inventory processes. Timesheet and labor cost enhancements simplify time tracking, bulk entries, shift differential management, and error correction on mobile devices.

notes.feature_name: Business Rule Engine
notes.description: Build more granular business-specific configurations by further categorizing Usage Types available in your Salesforce product into Usage Subtypes. Usage Subtype values are available depending on your industry solution and permission sets. Asynchronous processes in decision tables now create events when they are completed.

notes.feature_name: Connected Assets
notes.description: Connect, monitor, and control assets in real time to drive smarter service operations. Define asset structures, collect telemetry data, trigger remote actions, and integrate with Digital Twin to optimize performance, reduce downtime, and enable proactive service delivery.

notes.feature_name: Context Service
notes.description: Sort and filter data with context filters to retrieve precise and contextually relevant data with dynamic data filters in Context Service. Ensure continuous data flow across applications by modifying mappings without deactivating context definitions. The Time To Live (TTL) value of context instances created by Apex and flows is set to 10 seconds instead of 30 seconds.

notes.feature_name: Data Processing Engine
notes.description: DPE now offers a debugging feature in beta for CRMA jobs, providing enhanced visibility into failures and outputs to empower users and reduce support reliance. Write back transformed data directly to data model objects (DMOs) using the Data Cloud runtime, with options to create DMOs and validate data types. Writeback nodes are updated to support upserting records with an External ID, improving data sync across different systems.

notes.feature_name: Data Cloud Runtime Enhancements
notes.description: The Data Cloud runtime now includes functionality such as composite and custom nodes, the ability to write back to new DLOs, and a debug mode for saving node output record counts.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce for Manufacturing
notes.description: Scale operations and increase productivity with Agentforce for Manufacturing. New AI-driven capabilities support sales, service estimation, and proactive maintenance. Users can streamline product searches, quote creation, entitlement handling, and pricing calculations, while the agent reduces manual effort and ensures a more accurate outcome. Important: This feature uses Einstein Generative AI and may consume Einstein Requests or Flex Credits or Customer Data Cloud Requests. Einstein Generative AI Features and Data Cloud are provided on a separate infrastructure with different security protections and physical hosting locations than the Services. Note: Agentforce for Manufacturing is available only in English.

notes.feature_name: Industries Sales Concierge
notes.description: Empower your sales representatives with AI-driven conversational guidance and actionable insights to work faster and smarter, completing key sales tasks efficiently. Using the Industries Sales Concierge topic, sales reps can search for products and parts with conversational queries, retrieve pricing from the standard price book, and find relevant distributors who sell the chosen products or accessories. The agent helps reps pursue sales conversations with out‑of‑the‑box actions for opportunity and quote creation, initiate trade‑in requests for existing assets, generate appraisal records, and draft emails.

notes.feature_name: Enhanced Asset Service Estimation
notes.description: Improve proactive customer service by using the enhanced features of the Asset Service Estimation agent topics as part of the Asset Service Management agent. Efficiently select price books for a chosen service work type, the relevant products and their quantities. Choose to specify a different coverage for each product and simplify the process of incorporating asset warranties, entitlements, or service contracts. Create a more enriched quote with the specific discount details for each selected product. Create work orders with an asset’s account ID and with the asset name and work type name in the subject.

notes.feature_name: Manufacturing Sales Concierge
notes.description: Sales representatives manage multiple steps across product discovery, distributor selection, opportunity creation, and asset trade-ins. Performing these tasks manually increases effort and slows response times. AI-assisted interactions reduce context switching, convert natural language requests into structured actions, and help sales reps provide faster, more accurate responses to customer requests. To use the Manufacturing Sales Concierge agent topic, users need the Criteria-Based Search and Filter, and Partner Lead Management permission sets. In Setup, on the Agentforce Agents page, click New Agent. Then, select the Industries Sales Assistance agent template in Agent Builder. To use the Industries Sales Concierge topic, launch the Agentforce panel, and specify an utterance, such as 'show me products manufactured by Acme Industries'.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions with the Agentforce for Manufacturing add-on license or included in Agentforce 1 Manufacturing Edition

notes.feature_name: Asset Service Estimation
notes.description: Improve proactive customer service by using the enhanced features of the Asset Service Estimation agent topics as part of the Asset Service Management agent. Efficiently select price books for a chosen service work type, the relevant products and their quantities. Choose to specify a different coverage for each product and simplify the process of incorporating asset warranties, entitlements, or service contracts. Create a more enriched quote with the specific discount details for each selected product. Create work orders with an asset’s account ID and with the asset name and work type name in the subject. Manual service estimation processes can be error-prone and slow, particularly when calculating costs with multiple entitlements, warranties, and discounts. The agent streamlines selection of entitlement coverage, applies automated discounts, and calculates prices per quote line item, improving quote accuracy, decision-making, and service efficiency for your users. To give users the ability to manage asset services for customers by using an AI agent, in Setup, on the Agentforce Agents page, click New Agent. Then, select the Asset Service Management agent in Agent Builder. To use the Asset Service Estimation topic, launch the Agentforce panel, and specify an utterance, such as 'Give me repair estimates for this Asset.'
notes.edition: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited editions with the Agentforce for Manufacturing add-on license or included in Agentforce 1 Manufacturing Edition

notes.feature_name: Optimize Product Sample Management
notes.description: Optimize product sample management and streamline the full lifecycle from request to fulfillment and feedback within a unified ecosystem. Easily manage large sales agreements by viewing up to 20 product lines per page. Use enhanced filters to quickly narrow down associated products, making it faster to track, analyze, and update specific product details.

notes.feature_name: Sample Management
notes.description: Streamline the sampling lifecycle with Sample Management to ensure sample requests are complete, governed, and ready for fulfillment. Drive operational efficiency by centrally orchestrating sampling for standard catalog products and capturing detailed requirements for custom products. Track request progress through configurable stage management to improve visibility and control. Reduce manual effort and accelerate requirement processing through document uploads or optional AI-assisted extraction.

notes.feature_name: Orchestrate Sample Requests for Standard Products
notes.description: Simplify the sampling process for standard catalog products configured as samples by creating requests directly from opportunities, leads, visits, or sales agreements. Add products quickly through a guided flow, referencing price books to support accurate product selection. Monitor request status using configurable stage management for timely approvals and controlled sample distribution.

notes.feature_name: Streamline Custom Product Requirements Capture
notes.description: Capture custom product requirements either using the sample request workflow or independently. Track details like size and material alongside nonfunctional needs such as performance or compliance, while maintaining a clear version history for transparency. Improve efficiency and reduce manual effort by uploading requirement documents and optionally using Generative AI to extract and auto-populate specification details for faster review.

notes.feature_name: Configurable Stage Management
notes.description: Configurable stage management for timely approvals and controlled sample distribution.

notes.feature_name: Streamline Custom Product Requirements Capture
notes.description: Capture custom product requirements either using the sample request workflow or independently. Track details like size and material alongside nonfunctional needs such as performance or compliance, while maintaining a clear version history for transparency. Improve efficiency and reduce manual effort by uploading requirement documents and optionally using Generative AI to extract and auto-populate specification details for faster review.

notes.feature_name: Enhanced Sales Agreement Management
notes.description: Easily manage large sales agreements by viewing up to 20 product lines per page. The enhanced filtering capability helps you quickly narrow down the list of associated products, making it faster to track, analyze, and update specific product details in large sales agreements.

notes.feature_name: Increased Page Size for Large Sales Agreements
notes.description: Speed up the review and update process for your large Manufacturing Sales Agreements (MSAs) by increasing the number of product lines displayed per page from 5 to up to 20. This higher page size reduces the number of page loads required to view full agreements and significantly improves visibility across large MSAs.

notes.feature_name: Improved Sales Agreement Filters
notes.description: Managing large volumes of products within Sales Agreements often requires users to narrow down information quickly and focus on specific products, schedules, or metrics. The enhanced filter capabilities make this easier by allowing users to apply multiple, precise conditions directly on the Sales Agreement data grid. Users can filter by product lines, schedules, and any field corresponding to Sales Agreement Product Schedules, including custom fields, to view only the data most relevant to their updates. This improvement supports faster navigation, more targeted updates, and greater efficiency when working with Sales Agreements.

notes.feature_name: Locate Products Faster with Improved Sales Agreement Filters
notes.description: Managing large volumes of products within Sales Agreements often requires users to narrow down information quickly and focus on specific products, schedules, or metrics. The enhanced filter capabilities make this easier by allowing users to apply multiple, precise conditions directly on the Sales Agreement data grid. Users can filter by product lines, schedules, and any field corresponding to Sales Agreement Product Schedules, including custom fields, to view only the data most relevant to their updates. This improvement supports faster navigation, more targeted updates, and greater efficiency when working with Sales Agreements.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer editions with Manufacturing enabled

notes.feature_name: Manufacturing for Services
notes.description: Enhance operational efficiency with new capabilities that streamline inventory management. Allocate and count inventory with greater accuracy, manage time sheets, and accelerate recall handling with pre-built templates.

notes.feature_name: Access Claims from Product Service Campaign Items
notes.description: View claims on a product service campaign item record. Assign a related list and access the claims associated with a particular product service campaign item.

notes.feature_name: Associate Assets to Fleets Faster
notes.description: Easily associate assets to a new fleet or an existing fleet, from a fleet record page, or an asset list view. Search for assets using Criteria-Based Search and Filter and assign them immediately to an existing fleet based on the search result. Ensure efficient fleet management, optimizing workflows for fleet managers and inventory specialists.

notes.feature_name: Manage Appraisals on Experience Cloud Sites
notes.description: Users can now streamline equipment inspections with Trade-In Appraisal Management on Experience Cloud sites. Extend the data model by building your own integrations with external systems to fetch.

notes.feature_name: Manage Asset Recall Inquiries Using Prebuilt Service Templates
notes.description: Use prebuilt service process templates to handle asset-related recall inquiries, such as eligibility questions or dealer appointment details. These templates help Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) accelerate implementations, enabling faster deployments and improving operational efficiency. Easily view the list of assets for the selected customer account, check whether a specific asset is part of an active recall, and share details of the relevant authorized service partners. A case is created and automatically closed post fulfillment of the service process request and an email is sent to the customer with the relevant recall inquiry details.

notes.feature_name: Simplify Inventory Counting Across Parent and Child Locations
notes.description: Perform inventory counts across hierarchical structures, such as warehouses or service fleets, without creating separate plans for each room, aisle, or field service vehicle. Using the Location Hierarchy, you can easily define parent and child locations, so selecting a parent location in a plan automatically displays all its associated child locations. Inventory managers can then select child locations and bulk add or choose product items to create a single, comprehensive inventory count plan.

notes.feature_name: Optimize Timesheet and Labor Cost Management
notes.description: Associate assets with timesheets and capture detailed information by using configurable forms. Technicians can update verified timesheets to maintain accuracy, while supervisors and admins control the visibility of entry fields to match operational needs. Additionally, service resources can use Agentforce to handle time-tracking tasks like creating and verifying timesheets.

notes.feature_name: Access Claims from Product Service Campaign Items
notes.description: View claims on a product service campaign item record. Assign a related list and access the claims associated with a particular product service campaign item. This change applies to Lightning Experience in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions with Product Service Campaign Management, Unified Catalog, Industries Service Excellence, and Industries Field Service enabled. To use this feature, users need the Product Service Campaign, Industry Service Excellence, and Unified Catalog Admin permission sets.

notes.feature_name: Associate Assets to Fleets Faster
notes.description: Easily associate assets to a new fleet or an existing fleet, from a fleet record page, or an asset list view. Search for assets using Criteria-Based Search and Filter and assign them immediately to an existing fleet based on the search result. Ensure efficient fleet management, optimizing workflows for fleet managers and inventory specialists. This change applies to Lightning Experience in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions with Manufacturing enabled.

notes.feature_name: Manage Appraisals on Experience Cloud Sites
notes.description: Users can now streamline equipment inspections with Trade-In Appraisal Management on Experience Cloud sites. Extend the data model by building your own integrations with external systems to fetch asset valuation information.

notes.feature_name: Manage Asset Recall Inquiries Using Prebuilt Service Templates
notes.description: Use prebuilt service process templates to handle asset-related recall inquiries, such as eligibility questions or dealer appointment details. These templates help Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) accelerate implementations, enabling faster deployments and improving operational efficiency. Easily view the list of assets for the selected customer account, check whether a specific asset is part of an active recall, and share details of the relevant authorized service partners. A case is created and automatically closed post fulfillment of the service process request and an email is sent to the customer with the relevant recall inquiry details.

notes.description: Perform inventory counts across hierarchical structures, such as warehouses or service fleets, without creating separate plans for each room, aisle, or field service vehicle. Using the Location Hierarchy, you can easily define parent and child locations, so selecting a parent location in a plan automatically displays all its associated child locations. Inventory managers can then select child locations and bulk add or choose product items to create a single, comprehensive inventory count plan.

notes.feature_name: Single Inventory Count Plan
notes.description: This enhancement reduces administrative effort by allowing inventory managers to define a single, overarching plan at the parent location instead of creating a separate inventory count plan for every location where inventory was stored.

notes.feature_name: Optimize Timesheet and Labor Cost Management
notes.description: Associate assets with timesheets and capture detailed information by using configurable forms. Technicians can update verified timesheets to maintain accuracy, while supervisors and admins control the visibility of entry fields to match operational needs. Additionally, service resources can use Agentforce to handle time-tracking tasks like creating and verifying timesheets.

notes.feature_name: Efficient Inventory Allocation Across Locations
notes.description: Manage inventory allocation for sales orders and work orders across multiple locations with accurate, real-time visibility. View stock statuses, such as on-hand, allocated, and available, and soft-reserve inventory for specific orders. Assign inventory to orders to prevent overcommitment, and maintain accurate inventory visibility, even during high-volume, concurrent transactions.

notes.feature_name: Criteria-Based Search and Filter Enhancements
notes.description: This change improves data display and visibility by showing date-time fields in the user’s timezone using standard Salesforce formatting, and currency fields display symbols instead of codes. Word Search is enabled by default in all orgs, and users can view the Last Refreshed Date for search results, enhancing clarity and efficiency.
notes.edition: All editions with Criteria-Based Search and Filter

notes.feature_name: Extend Stage Management to Additional Manufacturing Objects
notes.description: Stage management is now implemented across more Manufacturing objects such as Asset, Fleet, Appraisal, Appraisal Item, Product Service Campaign Group Definitions, and Product Service Campaign Group Causal Item. This provides a structured, traceable, and controlled process for managing the life-cycle of Manufacturing business operations through defined stages, maximizing service efficiency, reducing turnaround time, and enhancing customer lifetime value.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions with Manufacturing enabled
affected_components: Product Service Campaign Group Causal Item

notes.feature_name: Enhanced Channel Revenue Management
notes.description: Channel Revenue Management now provides enhanced control and efficiency across partner inventory and incentive programs. New features include Stock Rotation Incentives, allowing partners to return or scrap aging stock for rotation credits, while maintaining financial control through precise budget allocation and tracking. Incentive budgets can now be defined, allocated, and monitored across partners and programs, with improved operational efficiency through integrated workflows for partner submission, eligibility validation, claim creation, and budget tracking.

notes.feature_name: Access Manufacturing Features and Setup in One Place
notes.description: Salesforce Go now supports a broader range of Manufacturing features that can be configured and managed from a single location in Setup. This allows for faster implementation of features, reduces context switching, and simplifies setup across your org.

notes.feature_name: Inventory Reservation Object
notes.description: Represent information about the status of the inventory reservations. Use the new Inventory Reservation object.

notes.feature_name: Inventory Item Reservation Object
notes.description: Represent inventory item reservation information for a specific product and location. Use the new Inventory Item Reservation object.

notes.feature_name: Product Item Additional Transaction Object
notes.description: Represent an individual transaction that records a change in the state and quantity of a specific product item. Use the new Product Item Additional Transaction object.

notes.feature_name: Sample Request Object
notes.description: Represent a request for product samples, including customer account details, request date, and status. Use the new Sample Request object.

notes.feature_name: Sample Request Item Object
notes.description: Represent sample or custom specification details associated with a sample request, including quantity, price, and cost information. Use the new Sample Request Item object.

notes.feature_name: Product Requirement Specification Object
notes.description: Represent a complete set of product requirements, including associated account and contact information, lifecycle status, and relationships to requirement items and their versions. Use the new Product Requirement Specification object.

notes.feature_name: Product Requirement Specification Item Object
notes.description: Represent a specific, measurable requirement within a requirement specification, defining delivery expectations and verification criteria for a requested product. Use the new Product Requirement Specification Item object.

notes.feature_name: Product Requirement Specification Version Object
notes.description: Use the new Product Requirement Specification Version object.

notes.feature_name: Quantity Allocated Field on Product Item
notes.description: Store the quantity of product items that are allocated but not yet shipped. Use the new field Quantity Allocated on Product Item.

notes.feature_name: Quantity Available Field on Product Item
notes.description: Store the quantity of product items that are currently available in inventory. Use the new field Quantity Available on Product Item.

notes.feature_name: Quantity State Refresh Date Field on Product Item
notes.description: Store the date and time when the quantity status of the product item was last updated. Use the new field Quantity State Refresh Date on Product Item.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Media Features Setup
notes.description: Streamline the setup process for Agentforce Media features such as Advertising Inventory Management and media plans through Salesforce Go's centralized dashboard. Streamline workflows by processing line items individually and refreshing media grids instantly. Manage audio and video ad spots precisely with dedicated maximum ad runtimes and skippable options. Maximize campaign precision with advanced inclusion rules, granular postal code options, and MuleSoft Direct enhancements for Google Ad Manager.

notes.feature_name: Accelerate Discovery and Setup of Media Cloud Features
notes.description: Accelerate time-to-value by using Salesforce Go's intuitive setup platform. Save time by centralizing all critical configuration tasks for Advertising Inventory Management, Revenue Schedules for Media, Media Proposals, and Media Plans in one comprehensive dashboard. Access the integrated content resources and links for continuous learning and configuration support.

notes.feature_name: Instant Processing and Real-Time Updates
notes.description: Accelerate your workflow by processing line items individually, enabling immediate interaction without the delay of waiting for all tasks to complete together. Improve the interface's responsiveness by using platform events to refresh media grids instantly as updates happen.

notes.feature_name: Instant Inventory Insight and Granular Campaign Control
notes.description: Get instant visibility into inventory levels with clear availability status indicators for every media plan. Create custom picklist values for the availability status, such as Available, Not Available, and Partially Available. Gain granular control over your video and audio campaigns by capturing the maximum ad duration and skippable settings, directly within the Line Item Details tab. Streamline your workflow with conditional UI rendering, ensuring you only see these new fields when configuring video or audio.

notes.feature_name: Improve Ad Campaign Precision with Advanced Targeting and MuleSoft Direct Enhancements
notes.description: Maximize the advertising campaign precision through advanced inclusion and exclusion rules for targeting, such as geo-targeting, inventory targeting, and custom targeting. Improve targeting accuracy with granular postal code options and support for ad space groups (placements). Use the MuleSoft Direct enhancements to allow Google Ad Manager to use the improved targeting and grouping capabilities in Advertising Sales Management.

notes.feature_name: Generate Larger Pitch Decks with Salesforce Document Generation
notes.description: Expand your media proposal capabilities with new support for document files up to 200 MB. Generate larger and detailed pitch decks with confidence. Experience optimized performance and flexibility when compiling your most data-intensive media proposals through pitch decks.

notes.feature_name: Generate Quotes for Customers in Multiple Locations (Pilot)
notes.description: Manage complex, large-scale quotes for customers with ease. Your sales representatives can group locations, apply products to entire groups simultaneously, and price quotes for multiple geographical locations efficiently.

notes.description: Accelerate time-to-value by using Salesforce Go's intuitive setup platform. Access the integrated content resources and links for continuous learning and configuration support.

notes.description: Learn more about the new resources available with Media Cloud. Added ratio-based AvailabilityStatus mapping through AdAvailsConfig to set the status and icon on AdQuoteLine. Added isIncluded (true/false) support to include or exclude targeting in MuleSoft Direct for Google Ad Manager. Added isGroup (true/false) to adSpaceSpecifications. Mule maps it to adUnitId or targetedPlacementIds, and ASM maps identifiers to adUnitId (Ad Space) or placement_id (Ad Space Group). Added postal code support to targeting in API specifications.

notes.feature_name: MaxDuration and Skippable Support
notes.description: Added MaxDuration and Skippable for video/audio AdQuoteLine items. The UI captures these values, and the API sends them as digitalAttributes.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce for Net Zero
notes.description: Use agents powered by generative AI to scale Net Zero Cloud Manager. The ESG Data Collection Agent engages with multiple stakeholders and collects information for environmental, social, and governance.

notes.feature_name: Enable Agentforce Net Zero Features Across All Dataspaces in Data Cloud One
notes.description: Create a single source of truth for your environmental, social, and governance (ESG) data by connecting multiple Salesforce orgs to a central Data 360 org. With Data Cloud One architecture, a Salesforce admin configures one home org and multiple companion orgs. This architecture helps organizations with complex configurations avoid data silos and fully leverage Agentforce Net Zero capabilities.

notes.feature_name: Simplify FERA Emissions Reporting for Scope 3 Category 3 Compliance
notes.description: Streamline the process of tracking and reporting Fuel and Energy-Related Activities (FERA) emissions and Transmission and Distribution losses under Scope 3 Category 3. You can now calculate and report both direct and upstream emissions from fuel and energy consumption for stationary and mobile assets, including electric vehicles, without creating duplicate energy use records. This feature aligns with the Greenhouse Gas Protocol and Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive requirements.

notes.feature_name: Improve Emissions Reporting for Leased Assets in Agentforce Net Zero
notes.description: Automatically assign emissions for stationary fuel combustion in leased assets to the appropriate scope 3, GHG category 8 Upstream Leased Assets. Use Agentforce Net Zero to manage your environmental impact, align with Greenhouse Gas Protocol standards, and prevent misstated emissions data.

notes.feature_name: Support All Quantitative Metrics for CSRD Reporting
notes.description: Support all required quantitative metrics for European Sustainability Reporting Standards (ESRS) E2, E3, E4, and E5 in your Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive disclosures by using the enhanced capabilities of Agentforce Net Zero.

notes.feature_name: Generate Consolidated Reports for Your Entire Organization
notes.description: Generate a report that consolidates environmental, social, and governance metrics from your parent company and its subsidiaries. Streamline the reporting process while meeting both regulatory and voluntary reporting needs efficiently.

notes.feature_name: Perform Advanced Environmental Data Analysis in Data 360
notes.description: Extend Data 360 capabilities by accessing all data model objects and calculated fields. This feature enables sustainability managers to perform detailed scenario modeling and operational analysis by using the audit-grade environmental accounting and reporting capabilities.

notes.feature_name: Enhance Emission Allocation with Category-Level Mappings
notes.description: Specify category-level mappings for emission allocations between child and parent organizations. You can then prepare more granular and accurate emissions reports, so that the data reflects the true impact of each entity within the organizational hierarchy.

notes.feature_name: Use Agentforce to Engage with Multiple Stakeholders to Collect ESG Data: ESG Data Collection
notes.description: Use the ESG Data Collection Agent to engage with multiple stakeholders and collect environmental, social, and governance (ESG) information. Based on the query, collect the data through the agent actions, process the information, and take further actions.

notes.feature_name: Electricity Lifecycle Emission Factor Set
notes.description: Store information about the emissions factors used to calculate greenhouse gas emissions that occur throughout the lifecycle of electricity. Use the new Electricity Lifecycle Emission Factor Set object.

notes.feature_name: Other Lifecycle Emission Factor Set
notes.description: Store a collection of emissions factors used to calculate emissions that occur throughout the fuel lifecycle, from extraction to end-of-life. Use the new Other Lifecycle Emission Factor Set object.

notes.feature_name: Other Lifecycle Emission Factor Set Item
notes.description: Store the individual emissions factor for a fuel used to calculate emissions that occur throughout its lifecycle, from extraction to end-of-life. Use the new Other Lifecycle Emission Factor Set Item object.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce for Public Sector
notes.description: Provide modern, AI-powered IT service management to your public sector employees with the full suite of Agentforce IT Service capabilities. Resolve issues faster by giving your employees conversational, personalized, AI-driven support in the most convenient channel. Accelerate self-service by using topics and actions provided in the Employee Request Management agent template.

notes.feature_name: AI Agent for Recruitment
notes.description: Accelerate hiring by using an AI agent to match qualified candidates to job positions based on skills, specializations, and location. Assist job seekers on your recruitment site with an agent that answers questions about hiring policies and processes.

notes.feature_name: Eligibility Tracking
notes.description: Capture essential details about a constituent, such as living arrangements and benefit duration, to help caseworkers make informed decisions about their benefit eligibility. Use eligibility reason codes to track eligibility determination, and record key dates of benefit issuance, closure, and notification to support the benefit assistance lifecycle.

notes.feature_name: Inbound Payments
notes.description: Help constituents pay for services, such as license and permit applications, directly on your public facing portal. By using Inbound Payments, you can embed a secure checkout flow into your Experience Cloud site. This integration helps constituents settle fees digitally and gives agency employees real-time visibility into payment status, reducing manual reconciliation and ensuring compliance before application approval.

notes.feature_name: Document Generation Enhancement
notes.description: Generate documents up to 300 MB to help with complex reporting needs, like investigative case files with high-resolution images or large data records. Agentforce Public Sector, formerly Public Sector Solutions, now packages this enhancement directly, so you can create large files without hitting previous size constraints.

notes.feature_name: Feature Discovery and Setup
notes.description: With Salesforce Go, discover, set up, and configure Investigative Case Management features, and track feature usage, all from a single location in Setup. Learn more about the features and get help with configuration by accessing content resources and links.

notes.feature_name: New and Changed Objects
notes.description: Do more with the new and changed Agentforce Public Sector, formerly Public Sector Solutions, objects.

notes.feature_name: New APIs
notes.description: Do more with the new API in Agentforce Public Sector, formerly Public Sector Solutions, objects.

notes.feature_name: Accounting Subledger
notes.description: Consolidate data between Salesforce CRM and your accounting system. Understand how and where funds are received, paid, and allocated.

notes.feature_name: Action Launcher
notes.description: Extend action recommendations by using contextual information from service records to determine user intent.

notes.feature_name: Action Plans
notes.description: Customize the quick actions on an action plan template record page. Include document checklist items in actions plans for financial accounts. Learn about the life events in a client’s household at a glance.

notes.feature_name: Actionable Relationship Center
notes.description: View many-to-one relationship type records on an Actionable Relationship Center (ARC) graph.

notes.feature_name: Batch Management Enhancements
notes.description: Use related object fields to control eligibility criteria and to group records for processing. Make the most of the new enhancements to fast-track batch job runs. All Spring '26 Batch Management changes are available for a limited set of process types, excluding the Flow process type.

notes.feature_name: Business Rules Engine Enhancements
notes.description: Experience improved scalability in decision tables with increased limits for invocations, output results, columns, and row processing. Expression sets enhancements include support for the IF function, automatic element naming, proactive alerts for constraint violations, and improved Salesforce Flow integration. Deploy rules to context definitions with improved stability. Monitor decision table actions in a centralized dashboard with real-time status and error details. Simplify the discovery and setup Business Rules Engine features with Salesforce Go. Clarify decisions with automated explanations for nested expression sets. Control how your expression set handles null values and no matches in decision tables based on your business requirements.

notes.feature_name: Compliant Data Sharing
notes.description: Compliant Data Sharing custom object record owners can now delete custom object participant records by using a new setting.

notes.feature_name: Context Service Enhancements
notes.description: Manage large context definitions with more ease by using the enhanced context definition mapping user interface with inline search and improved sort and filter abilities. Map extended context definitions to custom data spaces that contain preprocessed, harmonized, and unified data from multiple sources. Context Service now supports Second-Generation Managed Packaging (2GP). You can now package and deploy deactivated context definitions. Guided extensibility prevents mapping conflicts by enabling custom mappings only for allowed inherited nodes and attributes, ensuring stable upgrade experiences.

notes.feature_name: Criteria-Based Search and Filter
notes.description: Use Criteria-Based Search and Filter to design a search experience for your users. You can configure a search based on a single object that unifies complex sets of data, such as inventory and aggregated customer information that’s otherwise spread across multiple objects and fields. Criteria-Based Search and Filter can be customized to meet varied business requirements.

notes.feature_name: Discovery Framework Enhancements
notes.description: Easily present forms in the user's preferred language by storing assessment questions and responses in multiple languages. Keep historical data accurate by mapping each response to the specific version of the question, ensuring compliance. Save time by creating assessment questions with Generative AI so that you can generate, edit, and refine questions by using natural language instructions.

notes.feature_name: Data Processing Engine Enhancements
notes.description: Preview how your definitions transform data and instantly validate and debug definition design right for the builder. Create and run definitions in Data 360 companion orgs. Use a unified view to track the performance and key metrics of definitions. Get actionable recommendations for failed runs and download failed records to debug faster. Find and focus the Data Processing Engine canvas on nodes that you want to work on.

notes.feature_name: Fundraising Enhancements
notes.description: Give your staff and donors powerful tools for managing gifts. Donors can handle common requests, like changing recurring gifts, by using the self-service Donor Support Agent (beta). Free up your staff by customizing the Gift Entry Grid with templates and custom Lightning Web Components for faster processing. You can now add up to 50 designations to a single gift and backdate transactions for gift commitments, all from within the Gift Entry Grid. New object updates also help you track in-kind donations.

notes.feature_name: Application Form Object
notes.description: Adopt the Application Form object to future-proof your application process and ensure access to future platform enhancements. To improve completion rates, all form components are now mobile-friendly for a better user experience on any device. You can also require specific file attachments to prevent incomplete applications.

notes.feature_name: Interest Tags Sharing Rules
notes.description: Use sharing rules to extend sharing access to users for Tag Categories.

notes.feature_name: Omnistudio UI Test Automation Model
notes.description: Validate your workflows built with Omniscripts and Flexcards end-to-end by using the UI Test Automation Model (UTAM) framework. For a fast, scalable experience, add Omniscripts and Flexcards to Lightning Web Runtime (LWR) Experience Cloud sites (pilot). Get immediate help with an Omnistudio component or element with the Omnistudio Assistance AI Agent (pilot). With accessibility improvements for Omniscripts and Flexcards, create inclusive workflows and solutions for customers and users with disabilities. Filter empty records in Omnistudio Data Mapper Extract and Turbo Extract components with the Is Null operator.

notes.feature_name: Participant Lifecycle Management
notes.description: Manage the complete participant lifecycle with greater speed and accuracy. Potential participants can now browse programs as guest users on your Experience Cloud site to increase engagement. When participants apply, guide staff through a streamlined intake for one or many programs with real-time eligibility checks. Finally, capture service delivery faster with optimized mobile attendance tracking and accelerate your Data 360 readiness with updated data kits.

notes.feature_name: Record Rollup Definitions
notes.description: Configure multiple record rollup definitions within one LWC component for improved data visualization. Set up on-demand record rollup definitions quickly and efficiently using the guided setup. Help business executives make more informed decisions by using the enhancements to record rollup definitions.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce IT Service Management
notes.description: Provide modern, AI-powered IT service management to your public sector employees with the full suite of Agentforce IT Service capabilities. Resolve issues faster by giving your employees conversational, personalized, AI-driven support in the most convenient channel. Accelerate self-service by using topics and actions provided in the Employee Request Management agent template. Use the topics and actions in the IT fulfiller agent template to reduce repetitive manual work and accelerate issue resolution. Use Data 360 to enrich responses and reduce manual intervention for routine tasks.

notes.feature_name: Accelerate Hiring with AI Agent
notes.description: Accelerate hiring by using an AI agent to match qualified candidates to job positions based on skills, specializations, and location. Assist job seekers on your recruitment site with an agent that answers questions about hiring policies and processes. Help constituents identify necessary licenses and permits and answer their questions by deploying an agent grounded in your agency’s policy manuals.

notes.feature_name: Discover Licenses and Permits and Answer FAQs with Agentforce
notes.description: Help constituents identify the licenses, permits, and inspections they need for their business or personal goals by interacting with an AI agent on your License and Permit portal. Grounded in your agency’s policy manuals, the agent answers FAQs to reduce agency workload. It asks prescreening questions to understand constituents’ needs and guides them through the pre-application process, reducing the number of incorrect submissions.

notes.feature_name: Speed Up Candidate Sourcing with Agentforce Skill Matching
notes.description: Accelerate hiring by quickly surfacing qualified talent based on specialized skills for quicker review and decision-making. The agent helps recruiters identify candidates for a job position by matching specific skillsets and job specializations. The agent creates leads for the shortlisted candidates to track outreach, and sends emails inviting them to apply.

notes.feature_name: Answer Job Seeker Questions Instantly with Agentforce
notes.description: Help job seekers learn about your agency’s mission, hiring policies, and processes by interacting with an AI agent on your recruitment Experience Cloud site. Grounded in your policy manuals, the agent provides accurate responses to candidate inquiries. Candidates can ask follow-up questions to refine results, which helps them understand expectations and saves recruiters from answering repetitive questions.

notes.feature_name: Agentforce for Licensing, Permit, and Inspection (LPI)
notes.description: In Setup, configure the agent by using Agentforce and connect it to your Data 360 instance to ingest your unstructured policy manuals. Then, activate the prebuilt Licensing, Permit, and Inspection (LPI) Agent topic so the agent can answer questions about permit discovery by using Data 360’s retrieval augmented generation (RAG) capabilities. Also, assess constituent Licensing and Permit needs using the Business Rules Engine (BRE).

notes.feature_name: Agentforce Skill Matching
notes.description: Accelerate hiring by quickly surfacing qualified talent based on specialized skills for quicker review and decision-making. The agent helps recruiters identify candidates for a job position by matching specific skillsets and job specializations. The agent creates leads for the shortlisted candidates to track outreach, and sends emails inviting them to apply.

notes.feature_name: Recruitment FAQ Agent
notes.description: Help job seekers learn about your agency’s mission, hiring policies, and processes by interacting with an AI agent on your recruitment Experience Cloud site. Grounded in your policy manuals, the agent provides accurate responses to candidate inquiries. Candidates can ask follow-up questions to refine results, which helps them understand expectations and saves recruiters from answering repetitive questions.

notes.feature_name: Enhance Benefit Assistance with Comprehensive Data
notes.description: Capture essential details about a constituent, such as living arrangements and benefit duration, to help caseworkers make informed decisions about their benefit eligibility. Use eligibility reason codes to track eligibility determination, and record key dates of benefit issuance, closure, and notification to support the benefit assistance lifecycle.

notes.feature_name: Collect Fees for Public Sector Services with Inbound Payments
notes.description: Help constituents pay for services, such as license and permit applications, directly on your public facing portal. By using Inbound Payments, you can embed a secure checkout flow into your Experience Cloud site. This integration helps constituents settle fees digitally and gives agency employees real-time visibility into payment status, reducing manual reconciliation and ensuring compliance before application approval.

notes.feature_name: Generate Larger Documents for Agentforce Public Sector
notes.description: Generate documents up to 300 MB to help with complex reporting needs, like investigative case files with high-resolution images or large data records. Agentforce Public Sector, formerly Public Sector Solutions, now packages this enhancement directly, so you can create large files without hitting previous size constraints.

notes.feature_name: Enhance Agentforce Public Sector Feature Discovery and Setup
notes.description: With Salesforce Go, discover, set up, and configure Investigative Case Management features, and track feature usage, all from a single location in Setup. Learn more about the features and get help with configuration by accessing content resources and links.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions

notes.feature_name: New and Changed Objects in Agentforce Public Sector
notes.description: Do more with the new and changed Agentforce Public Sector, formerly Public Sector Solutions, objects. Relate an application form to a code to indicate an application decision or outcome using the new ApplicationFormRelatedCode object. Relate a benefit assignment to a benefit item code to indicate the approval or rejection reason of the benefit using the new BenefitAssignmentBenefitItemCode object. Relate the code set reason for approval or rejection of a business license using the new BusinessLicenseCodeSet object.

notes.feature_name: PaymentCart
notes.description: Store a collection of cart items whose total amount is used for a payment transaction. Use the new PaymentCart object.

notes.feature_name: PaymentCartItem
notes.description: Store details about a specific item in a payment cart, including the amount to be paid against an invoice. Use the new PaymentCartItem object.

notes.feature_name: AssignmentDate
notes.description: Capture the date when the benefit is assigned to the enrollee. Use the new AssignmentDate field on the existing BenefitAssignment object.

notes.feature_name: BenefitAssignmentKeywords
notes.description: Capture keywords that are associated with the benefit assignment. Use the new BenefitAssignmentKeywords field on the existing BenefitAssignment object.

notes.feature_name: BenefitAssignmentSummary
notes.description: Capture a summary of the benefit assignment. Use the new BenefitAssignmentSummary field on the existing BenefitAssignment object.

notes.feature_name: EligibilityDeterminationMethod
notes.description: Capture the method used to determine the eligibility of the enrollee for the benefit, such as online app, worker entry, or automated renewal. Use the new EligibilityDeterminationMethod field on the existing BenefitAssignment object.

notes.feature_name: TerminationNotificationDate
notes.description: Capture the date when the benefit termination notice was delivered. Use the new TerminationNotificationDate field on the existing BenefitAssignment object.

notes.feature_name: TerminationReason
notes.description: Capture the reason for terminating the benefit assignment. Use the new TerminationReason field on the existing BenefitAssignment object.

notes.feature_name: DisbursementMethod
notes.description: Store the method for benefit disbursement, such as cheque or bank transfer. Use the new DisbursementMethod field on the BenefitDisbursement object.

notes.feature_name: RegulatoryTrxnFeeId
notes.description: Associate a regulatory transaction fee with an order item. Use the new RegulatoryTrxnFeeId field on the existing OrderItem object.

notes.feature_name: Ethnicity
notes.description: Capture the ethnicity of the applicant. Use the new Ethnicity field on the existing PartyProfile object.

notes.feature_name: PreferredCommunicationMethod
notes.description: Store the preferred communication method for the applicant, such as email or WhatsApp message. Use the new PreferredCommunicationMethod field on the existing PartyProfile object.

notes.feature_name: HousingType
notes.description: Store the housing type of the party relationship group, such as rented, shared home, or self-owned. Use the new HousingType field on the existing PartyRelationShip object.

notes.feature_name: Capture the account information of the applicant
notes.description: Use the new Account field on the existing PersonExamination object.

notes.feature_name: Identify the designated billing contact for a business account
notes.description: Use the new BillingContact field on the existing RegulatoryTrxnFee object.

notes.feature_name: Add a description to a regulatory transaction fee
notes.description: Use the new Description field on the existing RegulatoryTrxnFee object.

notes.feature_name: Capture the total amount due for a regulatory transaction fee
notes.description: Use the new DueAmount field on the existing RegulatoryTrxnFee object.

notes.feature_name: Track the invoicing status of a regulatory transaction fee
notes.description: Use the new InvoicingStatus field on the existing RegulatoryTrxnFee object.

notes.feature_name: Capture the total amount paid toward a regulatory transaction fee
notes.description: Use the new PaidAmount field on the existing RegulatoryTrxnFee object.

notes.feature_name: Relate a fee to a parent fee to track disputes, cancellations, or refunds
notes.description: Use the new ParentRegulatoryTrxnFee field on the existing RegulatoryTrxnFee object.

notes.feature_name: Add a description to a regulatory transaction fee item
notes.description: Use the new Description field on the existing RegulatoryTrxnFeeItem object.

notes.feature_name: Relate a regulatory transaction fee item to a specific product
notes.description: Use the new Product2Id field on the existing RegulatoryTrxnFeeItem object.

notes.feature_name: Support for Regulatory Transaction Fee (RTF) Adjustments and Refunds
notes.description: The Recompute API is used when fees are recomputed, disputed, or cancelled. The adjustments to the existing Regulatory Transaction Fees (RTFs) can be positive or negative. For fee corrections, it automatically creates a new RTF against the original RTF and a corresponding new invoice for the adjusted amount. The original RTF is always set as the parent of the new RTF record. There are two types of adjustments: Positive adjustments create a new RTF and a new invoice for the additional fee. Negative adjustments create a new negative RTF and a new invoice, automatically generates a credit memo against the original invoice, adjusts payments, and processes a refund.

notes.feature_name: Streamline Transfer Credit Evaluations for Students
notes.description: Create and manage transfer equivalency relationships and the entire transfer credit process from a unified interface that automatically matches and suggests credits. Registrars can use the guided process to review submitted documentation and to articulate credit transfer requests.

notes.feature_name: Accelerate Transfer Credit Evaluations in the Application Process
notes.description: Speed up learning equivalency evaluations and reduce student wait time by requesting estimates for transferable credits directly in the application portal. Applicants can enter details of prior learning and upload supporting documents and images in each admissions application. They can also reuse previous estimates to prefill and create official transfer credit requests. When an applicant submits their information, automatically create records and streamline the review process.

notes.feature_name: Help Students Register for High-Demand Courses Efficiently
notes.description: Configure course waitlists to simplify the enrollment process and manage the demand for popular courses. Support students to join the waitlists of high-demand courses directly from the Experience Cloud site and notify them when seats open up, reducing the stress of monitoring course availability. Determine student enrollment priority and timing on a dedicated setup page. Send enrollment offers to students by using prebuilt flows. Students can accept or decline an offer to enroll, or remove themselves from waitlists.

notes.feature_name: Configure Educational Characteristics to Enforce Eligibility Checks During Course Registration
notes.description: Clearly communicate eligibility criteria to students during course registration. Configure complex eligibility logic on learning courses by using a flexible and scalable framework. Define and assign identity-based attributes to students, such as major, cohort, or honors status, that tie to specific time frames. Automatically evaluate student attributes against eligibility criteria to enforce enrollment rules. Show students the required educational characteristics of each course to help them make informed decisions. Maintain accurate enrollment data and comply with institutional policies.

notes.feature_name: Simplify Appointment Scheduling Setup in Agentforce Education
notes.description: System administrators get clear guidance at every stage to quickly set up appointment scheduling topics, assign staff, and complete all prerequisite steps. This feature drastically cuts down on configuration time and reduces errors. Staff members now have a simplified experience to manage their own and their colleagues’ availability with a few clicks. Institutions can configure scheduling quickly and accurately by using intuitive guidance and education-aligned language.

notes.feature_name: Gain Trusted Education Insights with a Unified Semantic Layer
notes.description: Use the Tableau Semantic Layer to organize your data into a single, reusable model. This shared layer calculates metrics consistently across Tableau Next components, Agents, and Marketing Cloud Growth campaigns. With one trusted source of truth, teams can analyze performance, generate data, and make decisions with confidence.

notes.feature_name: Empower Advisors to Help Students with Personalized Career and Goal Planning
notes.description: Provide personalized guidance and help students define and achieve career and life goals. Advisors can access the involvement groups and a library of career and interest assessments. They can recommend the right fit to students based on the student's profile, preferences, assessment insights, and so on.

notes.feature_name: Enhance the Efficiency of Academic Petitions and Waivers
notes.description: Easily create and manage academic petitions and waivers with an intuitive form builder and configurable approval workflows. Centralizing tracking and outcome management reduces manual errors and ensures a smoother process for administrators, students, and faculty or staff.

notes.feature_name: Explore Learning Programs and Request Details Directly in Campus and Program Finder
notes.description: Make the request for learning program information intuitive. Create a card view for learning programs in Campus and Program Finder. Provide a button for applicants, students, and families to request more information about specific learning programs conveniently.

notes.feature_name: Support Applicants to Sign and Manage Their Application Submissions
notes.description: Add control and flexibility to your dynamic admissions applications. Give applicants the option to digitally sign their applications when they’re ready to submit. Offer the flexibility to cancel unsubmitted applications and withdraw submitted ones.

notes.feature_name: Use Tailored Gift Visualizations for Each Planned Gift Type
notes.description: Access eight dynamic visualizations that automatically adapt to the structure of each planned gift type using Flexcards in the Gift Planning app. These Flexcards present the most important details at a glance, helping relationship officers quickly assess value, timelines, and stewardship needs. Select a gift type to get a layout that shows only the fields that matter, streamlining review and data entry.

notes.feature_name: Enhance Agentforce Education Feature Configuration and Setup
notes.description: Discover and find configuration instructions for a broader range of Education features in Salesforce Go. Along with Recruitment and Admissions, you can now learn more about Alumni and Advancement, Student Success, and Academic Operations features, and get help with configuration by accessing content resources and links.

notes.description: Do more with the new and updated Education objects.

notes.feature_name: New Invocable Actions for Agentforce Education
notes.description: Do more with the new invocable actions for Education.

notes.feature_name: New and Enhanced Common Features for Agentforce Education
notes.description: Agentforce Education, formerly Education Cloud, includes access to some features that are available across clouds and products in Industries. Use these features to extend and customize Education Cloud based on your business needs.

notes.feature_name: Fundraising
notes.description: Give your staff and donors powerful tools for managing gifts. Donors can handle common requests, like changing recurring gifts, by using the self-service Donor Support Agent (Beta). Free up your staff by customizing the Gift Entry grid with templates and custom Lightning Web Components for faster processing. You can now add up to 50 designations to a single gift and backdate transactions for gift commitments, all from within the Gift Entry Grid. New object updates also help you track in-kind donations and add multiple designations. Streamline workflows, improve data accuracy, and provide Relationship Officers with clear, gift-specific views, with dynamic page layouts for gift planning.

notes.feature_name: Streamline Student Financials with Agentforce
notes.description: Help students efficiently manage their accounts with the Student Financials Agent, which includes topics and actions that call on preconfigured flows and invocable actions. Students can chat with the agent to view their current balances, ask for fee breakdowns, and request more information about specific fees.
notes.edition: Enterprise, Unlimited, Developer editions with Education Cloud license

notes.feature_name: Provide Autonomous Transfer Credit Estimates to Prospective Students with Agentforce
notes.description: Help prospective students with application decisions by making transfer credit estimates readily accessible in the Transfer Credit Agent (beta). Estimate credits that are transferable into an institution or learning programs right in an agent session to reduce response time for evaluations. Save previous estimates to give students continuous access.

notes.feature_name: Strengthen Prospect Strategy by Creating Slack Research Channels and Canvases with Agentforce
notes.description: Integrate research workflows directly with Slack to accelerate decision making and improve collaboration across advancement teams. Give researchers and relationship officers a shared space to evaluate high-impact prospects. Researchers can build channels, publish canvases, and produce insights without leaving Slack. Relationship officers can join prospect-specific channels and review curated canvases.

notes.feature_name: Centralize Course Collaboration in Slack with Agentforce
notes.description: Manage Course Operations workflows in Slack with Agentforce. Faculty can create channels for each course offering, maintain accurate participant lists, and publish a syllabus canvas in the same space where communication already happens. Real-time updates and easier access to course resources provide students with a unified academic experience.

notes.feature_name: New and Changed Objects in Agentforce Education
notes.description: Do more with the new and updated Education objects. Represent a junction between an academic interval, such as an academic term, and an order using the new AcademicOrder object. Represent a characteristic about a student such as the student's major or student-athlete status using the new EducationalCharacteristic object. Represent the assignment of an educational characteristic to a student. Assignments are active for an academic interval such as an academic year or semester using the new EducCharacteristicAssignment object. Represent a category of educational characteristics such as major or campus using the new EducCharacteristicType object. Represent the assignment of an educational characteristic requirement to a learning or course offering using the new EducCharReqAssignment object. Represent the logic between multiple educational characteristics that defines an educational characteristic requirement using the new EducCharReqRelationship object.

notes.feature_name: EducCharRequirement
notes.description: Represent a definition of the educational characteristics that are needed to meet an educational requirement. Use the new EducCharRequirement object.

notes.feature_name: CourseWaitlistConfig

notes.feature_name: PriceBookAcademicInterval
notes.description: Represent a junction between a price book and an academic interval such as an academic term. Use the new PriceBookAcademicInterval object.

notes.feature_name: PriorLearningEvaluation
notes.description: Represent the evaluation of a learner's prior learning that can be used for a transfer. Use the new PriorLearningEvaluation object.

notes.feature_name: CourseCreditTransferAppln Enhancements
notes.description: Represent more details of a course credit transfer application. Use the new IndividualApplication, IsLearningInProgress, CreditType, IsForEstimation, LearningStartDate, LearningEndDate, and PriorLearningEval fields on the existing CourseCreditTransferAppln object.

notes.feature_name: WaitlistStatus and IsWaitlistActive Fields

Use the new AddedToWaitlist, WaitlistScore, EnrollmentOfferExpiration, and EnrollmentOfferDeclined fields and new picklist values on the ParticipationStatus field on the existing CourseOfferingParticipant object.

notes.feature_name: DonorGiftConceptOpportunity
notes.description: Represent the junction between a Donor Gift Concept and an Opportunity. Use the new DonorGiftConceptOpportunity object.

notes.feature_name: Invocable Actions for Agentforce Education
notes.description: Do more with the new invocable actions for Education. Note Education Cloud is now Agentforce Education. You may see references to Education Cloud in our application and documentation. Create an order and an associated academic order for a given learner and academic term using the new createLearnerOrder action.

notes.feature_name: getFeeDetails action
notes.description: Get the details of how a fee was calculated for a specified order item using the new getFeeDetails action.

notes.description: Adopt the Application Form object to future-proof your application process and ensure access to future platform enhancements. All form components are now mobile-friendly for a better user experience on any device.

notes.description: Your most-used Agentforce Nonprofit objects now support standard Salesforce features, providing a more consistent and powerful user experience. Improve usability and operational efficiency by enabling path, kanban, and calendar for objects related to fundraising, program management, and volunteer management.

notes.description: Find qualified volunteers for open job shifts quickly with a generative AI agent that matches volunteers based on their skills, location, and availability.
